classes.name: ToolCall
classes.description: Represents a record of a tool call made by the Orchestrator, including the tool name, arguments, output, success status, and optional thinking context.

classes.name: ToolUsageStats
classes.description: Tracks usage of orchestration tools and enforces call limits for web search and test runs.

classes.name: OrchestratorResult
classes.description: Represents the result of an orchestration process, containing analysis, instructions, tool calls, and file targets. Used to communicate outcomes between components.

classes.name: UserFile
classes.description: Represents a user-uploaded file with metadata such as filename, content, token count, and file type.

classes.name: GeneralChatResult
classes.description: Represents the result of the General Chat Orchestrator's processing, containing the final response, tool calls, raw response, and optional tool usage statistics.

classes.name: GeneralChatOrchestrator
classes.description: Оркеструет обработку общих чат-запросов, используя загруженные файлы и веб-поиск, с поддержкой юридического режима и ограничениями на количество итераций и поисков. Интегрируется с LLM, HistoryManager и инструментами вроде general_web_search.

classes.name: SelectedChunk
classes.description: Represents a selected code chunk with metadata such as file path, type, relevance score, and line numbers. Used for organizing and referencing relevant code segments during processing.

classes.name: PreFilterResult
classes.description: Represents the outcome of a pre-filtering process, including selected chunks, token count, and pruning statistics.

classes.name: RouteResult
classes.description: Represents the outcome of a routing decision, including the selected orchestrator model, complexity and risk levels, reasoning, confidence score, and whether the router was used.

classes.name: AnalyzerModel
classes.description: Enumeration for LLM selection in semantic analysis pipelines, maps model identifiers to API-compatible string values.

classes.name: AnalysisError
classes.description: Custom exception for code analysis failures, integrates with error handling in semantic indexing workflows.

classes.name: ImportInfo
classes.description: Data structure for tracking import metadata in source code, used for dependency analysis and token counting within semantic indexing workflows.

classes.name: GlobalsInfo
classes.description: Static metadata container for source code analysis, storing raw lines, extracted global identifiers, and token count for indexing.

classes.name: ClassInfo
classes.description: Data class for storing extracted Python class metadata, used for semantic indexing and analysis pipelines.

classes.name: FunctionInfo
classes.description: Stores metadata about a function including name, content, token count, hash, analysis source, description, and references. Used for semantic indexing and analysis.

classes.name: FileIndex
classes.description: Represents metadata and semantic information about a source file, including path, hash, token/line counts, imports, globals, description, and contained classes/functions.

classes.name: IndexStats
classes.description: Tracks indexing statistics and error logs for semantic analysis, including model usage, file operations, and performance metrics.

classes.name: ContentHasher
classes.description: Generates MD5 hashes for files, content strings, and code blocks, handling errors like file access issues.

classes.name: ResponseParser
classes.description: Parses and cleans AI-generated responses by removing thinking blocks, markdown, and prefixes, ensuring clean, meaningful output. Integrates with IndexStats for tracking parsing recoveries.

classes.name: AIClient
classes.description: Coordinates AI-based code analysis with Qwen and DeepSeek models, including fallback logic, token tracking, and error handling. Integrates with TokenCounter, IndexStats, and ResponseParser.

classes.name: ReferenceExtractor
classes.description: Extracts referenced functions, methods, and attributes from Python code using AST parsing and regex fallback, filtering out built-in names.

classes.name: AsyncFileProcessor
classes.description: Manages asynchronous file processing with a concurrency limit of 25 workers, supports batch processing and progress tracking. Integrates with custom processing functions and file I/O via aiofiles.

classes.name: ParallelChunkProcessor
classes.description: Processes file chunking in parallel using multiple processes, integrates with SmartPythonChunker for parsing and structuring Python files.

classes.name: SemanticIndexer
classes.description: Incremental semantic indexer for Python files in a directory, supporting parallel processing, caching, and compressed index updates. Integrates with AI analysis, token counting, and reference extraction.

classes.name: IndexFileWatcher
classes.description: File system watcher for real-time semantic index updates using watchdog, implements debounced batch processing with async event handling.

classes.name: APIProvider
classes.description: Defines an enumeration of supported API providers for external AI services.

classes.name: LLMResponse
classes.description: Standardizes responses from LLM APIs with metadata tracking, including token usage, cost, latency, and model-specific reasoning details. Integrates with API providers for compatibility and diagnostics.

classes.name: LLMRequest
classes.description: Standardized structure for LLM requests with configurable parameters like model, temperature, and tools. Designed for compatibility with various LLM APIs.

classes.name: ModelRouter
classes.description: Routes model names to the appropriate API provider and endpoint based on configuration, returning connection details like provider, API key, base URL, and extra parameters. Integrates with settings.py for centralized configuration.

classes.name: LLMClient
classes.description: Universal LLM client with multi-provider support (DeepSeek, Anthropic, Gemini, etc.), featuring automatic model routing, retry logic, rate limit handling, tool calling, and extended thinking support for Claude models. Integrates with ModelRouter for connection details and tracks usage statistics.

classes.name: LLMAPIError
classes.description: Base exception class for LLM API errors, with support for error type and message attributes.

classes.name: RateLimitError
classes.description: Represents a rate limit error (HTTP 429) for the LLM API client, extending the base LLMAPIError with a specific error type.

classes.name: RetryableError
classes.description: Represents errors from the API that are retryable, such as 5xx server errors or network issues. Inherits from LLMAPIError and identifies itself as a "retryable" error type.

classes.name: ContextOverflowError
classes.description: Represents an error when the context or token limit is exceeded in an API call, requiring input compression.

classes.name: MessageStructureError
classes.description: Represents an error for invalid message structures in API communication, such as missing thought_signature or empty parts.

classes.name: AIService
classes.description: Unified LLM API client with OpenAI-compatible interface, supporting DeepSeek and OpenRouter providers with configurable model selection and structured response handling.

classes.name: ReadRequest
classes.description: Data class for file read configuration in a token-aware processing system, specifying project-relative paths, chunking modes, and context inclusion.

classes.name: ReadResponse
classes.description: Data container for file read operation results, providing status, metadata, and optional parsed content for integration with document processing systems.

classes.name: FileReaderTool
classes.description: Intelligent file reader with automatic type detection and token-aware chunking, outputs XML-wrapped content for AI processing with configurable full/chunked delivery modes.

classes.name: WriteRequest
classes.description: Data container for file write operations with configurable modes (full file or range replacement), supporting optional validation and metadata.

classes.name: WriteResponse
classes.description: Data transfer object for file write operation results, encapsulating success status, error details, and optional syntax validation metadata.

classes.name: FileWriterTool
classes.description: Обеспечивает запись и редактирование файлов с поддержкой замены всего файла или диапазона строк, включая валидацию Python-синтаксиса и отступов. Интегрируется с FileTypeDetector для определения типа файла.

classes.name: GoChunk
classes.description: Go source code chunk extractor for semantic segmentation, outputs structured metadata and raw content for indexing or analysis pipelines.

classes.name: SmartGoChunker
classes.description: Go source code parser that extracts hierarchical semantic chunks (package, imports, types, functions) using regex patterns and token-aware segmentation.

classes.name: IndexStats
classes.description: Data container for indexing metrics with semantic analysis, project mapping, compression, and error tracking, serializable to JSON via to_dict().

classes.name: SyncStats
classes.description: Data container for incremental file synchronization metrics with AI processing statistics, serializable to JSON for logging and monitoring.

classes.name: IndexCompressor

functions.name: orchestrate
functions.description: Analyzes user queries with selected code chunks and orchestrates tool execution for code generation, integrating with LLM models, file operations, and search tools.

functions.name: _format_test_run_limit_error
functions.description: Generates a formatted XML error message when the maximum number of test runs is exceeded, showing usage statistics and guidance.

functions.name: _process_file_tools_with_batch_limit
functions.description: Processes file-reading tool calls with a token limit, executing them until the limit is reached and deferring remaining files, while also handling non-file tools and tracking usage statistics. Integrates with TokenCounter and ToolUsageStats.

functions.name: _format_batch_limit_skip_message
functions.description: Generates a structured message when a file is skipped due to exceeding the batch token limit, instructing the model to request the file in a subsequent call.

functions.name: _should_use_batch_limit
functions.description: Determines if a model should use a batch file token limit based on predefined models with constrained context windows.

functions.name: orchestrate_new_project
functions.description: Orchestrates the creation of a new project by using an LLM to generate setup instructions and leveraging limited tools like web_search, ensuring a final response is generated even if no instruction section is found. Integrates with tool execution and logging systems.

functions.name: _has_instruction_section
functions.description: Checks if the provided content contains an instruction section using predefined regex patterns. Used to detect missing instructions in Orchestrator responses.

functions.name: _get_available_tools
functions.description: Filters and returns a list of available tools by checking usage limits for specific functions like web_search and run_project_tests.

functions.name: _format_web_search_limit_error
functions.description: Generates an error message when web_search usage exceeds the session limit, displaying current usage and remaining tools. Integrates with ToolUsageStats for tracking.

functions.name: _format_chunks_for_context
functions.description: Formats a list of selected code chunks into a structured, human-readable context string for the Orchestrator, including chunk metadata, relevance scores, and code snippets.

functions.name: _format_chunks_as_initial_context_message
functions.description: Formats selected code chunks into a user message for initial context, including file details, relevance scores, and code snippets; returns the formatted message or None if no chunks are provided.

functions.name: _remove_chunks_message_from_history
functions.description: Removes a specific user message containing "PRE-FILTERED CODE CHUNKS" from the message history to optimize token usage, logs the removal and context reduction.

functions.name: _parse_orchestrator_response
functions.description: Parses Orchestrator responses into structured analysis and instruction sections, supporting multiple languages and formats, with fallback strategies for robust extraction. Integrates with regex patterns and logging for debugging.

functions.name: _looks_like_instruction
functions.description: Determines if a given text contains actionable instruction markers or code-related content, indicating it's more than just analysis. Used to differentiate between instructions and general commentary.

functions.name: _validate_instruction_format
functions.description: Validates the format of an instruction string against required headers and structure, returning a tuple of validation status and a list of issues. Uses regex to check for required elements like SCOPE, Task, and file specification.

functions.name: _optimize_cache_by_size
functions.description: Optimizes message cache by removing cache_control from smaller blocks, keeping only the top N largest ones by text size. Integrates with message content structure and logging.

functions.name: orchestrate_agent
functions.description: Orchestrates an agent mode workflow with context compression, tool execution, and iterative LLM interaction, integrating with file operations, web search, and Claude cache optimization.

functions.name: pre_filter_chunks
functions.description: Selects top relevant code chunks from a project index based on user query and model-specific token limits, integrating with LLMs like DeepSeek and handling dynamic token constraints for different orchestrator models.

functions.name: _load_all_chunks_with_code
functions.description: Loads all code chunks from either a compressed or regular index, using the project directory to retrieve the actual code, and tracks tokens used.

functions.name: _load_from_regular_index
functions.description: Loads code chunks (classes and functions) from a regular semantic index, using file paths and line ranges to extract content and descriptions. Integrates with _extract_chunk_from_lines and TokenCounter for processing.

functions.name: _load_from_compressed_index
functions.description: Loads code chunks (classes and functions) from a compressed semantic index, using file caching and line extraction; integrates with token counter and file reading utilities.

functions.name: _extract_chunk_from_lines
functions.description: Extracts a code chunk from a file based on specified line numbers, returning a SelectedChunk object with metadata like token count and code content. Integrates with TokenCounter for token estimation.

functions.name: _read_file_safe
functions.description: Safely reads the contents of a file with fallback encodings (UTF-8 to Latin-1) and returns None if the file doesn't exist or reading fails.

functions.name: _build_chunks_for_llm
functions.description: Selects and prioritizes chunks for LLM input based on token budget, ensuring the total stays under the specified limit while including as many relevant chunks as possible. Integrates with chunk metadata and logging for monitoring.

functions.name: _call_prefilter_llm
functions.description: Calls a pre-filter LLM to rank or select relevant code chunks based on the user query and full code content, integrating with LLM models and logging for error tracking.

functions.name: _format_chunks_with_code
functions.description: Formats selected code chunks with metadata and code for LLM input, using a structured, multi-chunk template.

functions.name: _get_prefilter_system_prompt

functions.name: _get_prefilter_user_prompt
functions.description: Generates a user prompt for a Pre-filter LLM to select the most relevant code chunks based on a query, project map, and list of chunks. Integrates with data passed as strings for LLM processing.

functions.name: _parse_prefilter_response
functions.description: Parses the Pre-filter LLM response into a list of selected chunks, using JSON extraction with fallback to regex parsing. Integrates with logging and helper functions for error handling and data normalization.

functions.name: _extract_json_from_response
functions.description: Extracts a JSON object from an LLM response using markdown code block detection or brace matching. Returns the JSON string if found, otherwise returns None.

functions.name: _extract_by_brace_matching
functions.description: Extracts a JSON object from a string starting at a given index by matching opening and closing braces, handling string and escape characters appropriately.

functions.name: _clean_json_string
functions.description: Removes common JSON formatting issues like trailing commas and invisible characters from a JSON string.

functions.description: Normalizes a list of chunk dictionaries by extracting and validating chunk IDs, relevance scores, and reasons, then returns the top max_chunks sorted by relevance score.

functions.name: _try_regex_extraction
functions.description: Extracts structured data from a response string using regex as a fallback method, returning a list of chunk details with relevance scores and reasons.

functions.name: _get_selected_chunks
functions.description: Filters and returns selected chunks by ID, updating their relevance scores and reasons based on input, then sorts them in descending order of relevance.

functions.name: _apply_token_limit
functions.description: Reduces the total token count by removing the least relevant chunks until under the specified token limit, returning the pruned list and pruning details. Integrates with logging for tracking removed chunks.

functions.name: _fallback_selection
functions.description: Selects the first N chunks with default relevance scores when the LLM fails, returning a list of simplified chunk metadata.

functions.name: _empty_result

Used to determine which AI model should handle the task.

functions.name: _build_router_user_prompt
functions.description: Constructs a user prompt template for task classification, combining the user query and project context into a structured format.

functions.name: _get_model_for_complexity

functions.name: _extract_json_from_response

functions.description: Normalizes and validates a router result dictionary by mapping orchestrator strings to complexity levels, ensuring consistent formatting for fields like confidence, reasoning, and risk level.

functions.description: Generates a structured prompt template for Orchestrator in ASK mode, guiding the response format for analysis and code generation instructions.

functions.name: _build_orchestrator_system_prompt_new_project
functions.description: Generates a detailed system prompt for an AI orchestrator in NEW PROJECT mode, guiding architectural design with dependency graphs, layered structure, and precise file instructions for code generation. Integrates with web_search for research and ensures compatibility with a code generation workflow.

functions.name: _build_orchestrator_user_prompt_new_project
functions.description: Constructs a user prompt template for the Orchestrator in NEW PROJECT mode by combining a label and the user's query.

functions.name: _build_code_generator_system_prompt
functions.description: Generates a detailed system prompt for a code generation AI, specifying rules for handling code modification tasks, formatting output with custom markers, and separating explanations from code. Integrates with Orchestrator instructions for precise code updates.

functions.name: _build_code_generator_user_prompt
functions.description: Генерирует шаблон пользовательского запроса для кодогенератора, включающий инструкции, контекст существующего кода и проверочные списки для корректного формирования ответа.

functions.name: _build_code_generator_user_prompt
functions.description: Generates a structured user prompt template for a code generation task, including sections for instructions, existing code, and validation checks.

functions.name: _build_history_compressor_tool_result_prompt
functions.description: Generates a structured prompt for compressing tool results by specifying what to keep and remove, used to condense output while preserving key information.

functions.name: _build_history_compressor_reasoning_prompt
functions.description: Generates a structured prompt template for compressing AI-generated reasoning while preserving key conclusions and removing redundant details. Used to guide text reduction in post-processing workflows.

functions.name: format_prefilter_prompt
functions.description: Formats a system and user prompt for pre-filtering with variables like user query, chunks, and project map, using predefined templates.

functions.name: format_orchestrator_prompt_ask
functions.description: Formats Orchestrator prompts for ASK mode with adaptive blocks based on model type, integrating user queries, project maps, and conversation context.

functions.name: format_orchestrator_prompt_new_project
functions.description: Formats Orchestrator prompts for new project mode with adaptive blocks based on model ID, returning system and user prompt strings. Integrates with web search limits and model-specific logic.

functions.name: format_orchestrator_prompt
functions.description: Formats orchestrator prompts for either new projects or existing queries, selecting the appropriate template based on the is_new_project flag. Integrates with model-specific configurations and search management.

functions.name: format_code_generator_prompt
functions.description: Formats prompts for a code generator by combining system and user instructions, using provided orchestrator instruction and optional file code.

functions.name: format_compression_prompt
functions.description: Formats a compression prompt using predefined templates based on the content type, defaulting to "tool_result".

functions.name: _build_ai_validator_system_prompt
functions.description: Generates a system prompt for an AI code validator to assess generated code against user requests, technical instructions, and critical code quality issues, ensuring correctness and functionality before approval.

functions.name: _build_ai_validator_user_prompt
functions.description: Constructs a structured user prompt template for an AI validator to assess code changes, including sections for the user request, orchestrator instruction, original content, and proposed code.

functions.name: format_ai_validator_prompt
functions.description: Constructs AI Validator prompts for code validation by combining user request, original content, and proposed code, using predefined system and user prompt templates.

functions.name: format_orchestrator_prompt_general
functions.description: Формирует системный и пользовательский промпты для режима общего чата или юридического консультационного режима, включая инструкции по использованию инструментов поиска, обработке файлов и структурированию ответа.

functions.name: get_messages_for_role
functions.description: Generates formatted message lists for specific roles using role-based prompt formatters, supporting roles like orchestrator, code generator, and general chat. Integrates with various prompt formatting functions and returns structured messages for downstream processing.

functions.name: _build_agent_mode_instruction_format
functions.description: Generates a structured instruction template for Agent Mode, defining how to format code change requests and decisions between direct answers and code modifications. Integrates with code generation pipelines for precise execution.

functions.name: _build_agent_mode_response_format
functions.description: Constructs a standardized response format template for Agent Mode, outlining sections for analysis and instructions, used to guide code generation and revisions.

functions.name: _build_orchestrator_system_prompt_ask_agent
functions.description: Generates a detailed system prompt for Orchestrator in Agent Mode, extending the standard ASK prompt with feedback handling, pipeline awareness, and strategic execution principles, while preserving existing blocks and integrating tools for code analysis, dependency management, and advice-based reasoning.

functions.name: _build_orchestrator_user_prompt_ask_agent
functions.description: Constructs a user prompt template for the Orchestrator in Agent Mode, used for existing projects; includes placeholders for user queries and feedback, and specifies response format with Analysis and Instruction sections.

functions.name: _build_orchestrator_system_prompt_new_project_agent
functions.description: Generates a detailed system prompt for an AI acting as a lead software architect in agent mode for new projects, emphasizing folder/file creation, code generation limits, error handling, and structured response formats. Integrates with tools like web_search, install_dependency, and advice frameworks for informed architectural decisions.

functions.name: _build_orchestrator_user_prompt_new_project_agent
functions.description: Constructs a user prompt template for the Orchestrator in Agent Mode for new projects, including user query, feedback section, and instructions for project design.

functions.name: _build_code_generator_system_prompt_agent
functions.description: Generates a structured system prompt for a code generation agent, specifying how to output code modifications in a precise format for automated file updates. Integrates with code modification enums and file handling logic.

functions.name: _build_code_generator_user_prompt_agent
functions.description: Constructs a structured user prompt template for the Code Generator in Agent Mode, incorporating an orchestrator instruction and existing file contents. Used to guide code generation with clear XML-formatted sections.

functions.name: format_code_generator_prompt_agent
functions.description: Formats code generation prompts for agent mode, supporting both single and multiple file inputs. Integrates with helper functions to build user prompts and format file contents.

functions.name: _format_multiple_files
functions.description: Formats multiple files into a structured string for Code Generator context, separating each file with markers and displaying its content or a placeholder if empty.

functions.name: _build_user_prompt_with_files
functions.description: Constructs a user prompt with instructions and file content for code generation, handling both single and multi-file scenarios with appropriate formatting and warnings.

functions.name: format_orchestrator_prompt_ask_agent
functions.description: Formats prompts for the orchestrator in agent mode for existing projects, integrating project structure, feedback, and adaptive logic to guide AI responses.

functions.name: format_orchestrator_prompt_new_project_agent
functions.description: Formats Orchestrator prompts for agent-based new project workflows, integrating feedback, validation errors, and generated code context into structured system/user prompts.

functions.name: format_code_generator_prompt_agent
functions.description: Formats prompts for the Code Generator in agent mode using an orchestrator instruction and optional file context. Returns a dictionary containing system and user prompt strings.

functions.name: build_go_context
functions.description: Assembles Go source context by aggregating package, imports, and receiver struct definitions for a target chunk, formatted for AI model consumption.

functions.name: _validate_settings
functions.description: Validates the presence of required settings in config/settings.py, raising an ImportError if any are missing.

functions.name: default_progress_callback
functions.description: Provides a default progress callback that logs messages with current/total progress, used for tracking operations in index manager tasks.

functions.name: build_full_index
functions.description: Performs full project indexing asynchronously, optionally reporting progress via a callback and returning index statistics. Uses FullIndexBuilder for processing.

functions.name: sync_index
functions.description: Выполняет инкрементальное обновление индексов в указанном проекте, используя обратный вызов для отслеживания прогресса. Возвращает статистику изменений в виде объекта SyncStats.

functions.name: get_index_stats
functions.description: Retrieves statistics about existing indexes in a project directory, including semantic index, project map, compression status, and file/token counts. Returns a dictionary with the results or None if no indexes are found.

functions.name: is_index_compressed
functions.description: Checks if a compressed index is being used for the project. Returns True if the compressed index file exists.

functions.name: load_semantic_index
functions.description: Loads a semantic index (standard or compressed) from a project directory, automatically detecting and returning the appropriate format. Integrates with file system operations and JSON parsing.

functions.name: quick_search
functions.description: Index lookup wrapper for project file search, integrates with IndexReader for query processing and result retrieval.

functions.name: get_file_info
functions.description: Retrieves file metadata quickly from a project index, returning information as a dictionary or None if not found. Integrates with IndexReader for efficient file lookup.

functions.name: main
functions.description: CLI tool for querying and analyzing a project index, integrates with IndexReader for file, class, function, and dependency information retrieval.

functions.name: _validate_settings
functions.description: Validates the presence of required settings in settings.py upon module import, raising an ImportError if any are missing. Checks for PROJECT_MAP_MAX_FILE_TOKENS and PROJECT_MAP_DESCRIBE_MODEL.

functions.name: build_project_map
functions.description: Constructs a project map by initializing a ProjectMapBuilder and asynchronously building the map from the specified project path.

functions.name: sync_project_map
functions.description: Synchronizes a project map incrementally using a ProjectMapBuilder, supporting optional code map context. Utilizes async operations for efficiency.

functions.name: get_project_map_for_prompt
functions.description: Generates a compact project map string for use in prompts, using the ProjectMapBuilder to process the given project path.

functions.name: flatten_tree_to_chunks
functions.description: Tree-to-list converter for AST node serialization, outputs structured chunks with parent-child metadata.

functions.name: find_node_in_tree
functions.description: Recursively searches a Python AST node tree by ID, returning the matching node or None if not found.

functions.name: get_node_hierarchy
functions.description: Traverses a Python AST tree to return the hierarchy path from the root to the specified node, using recursive search.

functions.name: build_context_for_chunk
functions.description: Constructs a contextual string for a Python code chunk by including relevant imports, global variables (if not the target), and the target chunk itself, formatted with metadata for use in AI processing.

functions.name: build_context_for_tree_node
functions.description: Собирает контекст для узла Python-дерева, включая импорты, глобалы и заголовки родительских классов, чтобы передать его ИИ. Используется для предоставления полного контекста при обработке конкретного узла.

functions.name: _extract_class_header
functions.description: Extracts the class header (lines before the first method definition) from the given class content string.

functions.name: build_sql_context
functions.description: Generates SQL context for AI processing by embedding table schema definitions before DML operations, integrating with a chunk-based SQL parsing system.

functions.name: group_sql_by_table
functions.description: Groups SQL chunks by table name for operation analysis, excluding file-type chunks and mapping unnamed statements to a misc category.

functions.name: create_compact_index
functions.description: Generates a compact markdown project structure from a semantic index, grouping files by directory and showing names, token counts, and truncated descriptions. Used by Orchestrator to navigate and understand the project layout.

functions.name: create_chunks_list_for_prefilter
functions.description: Generates a JSON-formatted list of code chunks (classes and functions) from a semantic index for use with Pre-filter, including metadata like name, file, lines, tokens, and references.

functions.name: get_chunk_info_from_index
functions.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific code chunk (class or function) from an index using a chunk ID formatted as "file_path:element_name". Searches both exact and similar file paths and matches against class or function names.

functions.name: count_total_chunks
functions.description: Counts the total number of classes and functions across all files in a semantic index.

functions.name: load_index_from_file
functions.description: Loads a semantic index from a JSON file, returning the parsed dictionary or None if the file is missing or invalid.

functions.name: extract_code_from_response
functions.description: Extracts code content from an XML-formatted response string, optionally validating the syntax. Returns the extracted content as a string or None if no block is found.

functions.name: extract_and_validate
functions.description: Extracts and validates code from an XML response, checking for syntax validity and language match. Returns the code, validation status, and any error message.

functions.name: wrap_python_chunk_with_context
functions.description: Generates an XML-wrapped representation of a Python code chunk with contextual imports and globals from related chunks.

functions.name: wrap_go_chunk_with_context
functions.description: Wraps a GoChunk with its contextual chunks in XML format using an XMLWrapper. Integrates with GoChunk and XMLWrapper classes for structured output.

functions.name: wrap_sql_chunk_with_context
functions.description: Wraps an SQL chunk with its context using XML, utilizing a list of related SQL chunks for contextual inclusion.

functions.name: wrap_file_simple
functions.description: Wraps a file in XML format using detected file type and token count, integrating with FileTypeDetector and TokenCounter.

functions.name: create_hierarchy_wrapper
functions.description: Factory function that creates and returns an instance of HierarchyXMLWrapper, used for handling XML hierarchy structures.

functions.name: prepare_method_for_ai
functions.description: Prepares a method chunk for AI analysis by wrapping it with hierarchy information. Uses HierarchyXMLWrapper to build a structured representation for further processing.

functions.name: prepare_class_for_ai
functions.description: Prepares a class and its methods for AI analysis by creating hierarchical XML wrappers, integrating with HierarchyXMLWrapper for structure and inheritance representation.

functions.name: print_config_summary
functions.description: Выводит в консоль сводную информацию о конфигурации AI-агента, включая режим работы роутера, используемые модели, настройки и статус API-ключей.

functions.name: calculate_stats
functions.description: Statistical computation function for integer lists, returns aggregated metrics as a dictionary.

functions.name: fetch_data
functions.description: Asynchronously fetches data from a given URL using aiohttp and returns it as a dictionary, or None if an error occurs.

functions.name: format_name
functions.description: String formatting utility for concatenating and capitalizing first and last names into a title-case full name string.

functions.name: validate_email
functions.description: Validates an email address using a regular expression pattern.

functions.name: log_ai_error
functions.description: Логирует ошибки, связанные с AI-операциями, с контекстом, моделью, усеченными данными запроса и ответа, используя отдельный логгер и основной лог.

functions.name: log_pipeline_stage
functions.description: Логирует этапы pipeline с сообщениями, данными и ошибками, поддерживает усечение больших данных и вывод в консоль при включенном DEBUG-режиме. Интегрируется с логгерами logger и ai_logger.

functions.name: check_navigation
functions.description: Проверяет введенные пользователем команды на соответствие командам навигации и генерирует исключения для перехода назад, в меню или выхода.

functions.name: print_navigation_hint
functions.description: Displays navigation hints with options to go back, return to the main menu, or exit, with customizable visibility for "back" and "menu" options.

functions.name: prompt_with_navigation
functions.description: Обёртка над Prompt.ask с поддержкой навигационных команд (назад, меню, выход), интегрируется с пользовательским вводом и обработкой исключений.

functions.name: confirm_with_navigation
functions.description: Provides a navigation-aware confirmation prompt with support for back, menu, and quit actions, using default values and handling keyboard interrupts. Integrates with navigation system through exceptions and prompt handling.

functions.name: print_header
functions.description: Displays the application header with title, version, and purpose using rich console formatting.

functions.name: print_status_bar
functions.description: Generates and prints a status bar with current application state information, including mode, project, models, thread, and token usage, using rich text formatting.

functions.name: print_main_menu
functions.description: Displays the main application menu with available modes, settings, and options using a styled console table, integrated with console and state modules for UI and configuration.

functions.name: print_about
functions.description: Выводит подробную информацию о программе AI Код Агент, включая описание функционала, режимы работы, команды, конфигурацию и требования, используя библиотеки rich и Markdown для форматированного отображения.

functions.name: print_thinking
functions.description: Отображает процесс мышления агента в виде панели с возможностью перевода на русский, используя библиотеку rich для форматирования вывода.

functions.name: print_instruction
functions.description: Отображает инструкцию для Code Generator в виде форматированного панели с поддержкой усечения длинного текста. Использует Rich библиотеку для вывода Markdown-содержимого в консоль.

functions.name: print_tool_call
functions.description: Отображает результаты вызова различных инструментов с форматированием, зависящим от типа инструмента, используя emoji, описания и усечённый вывод. Интегрируется с функциями вроде _extract_search_results и _truncate_output для обработки вывода.

functions.name: _truncate_output
functions.description: Усекает строку вывода до заданного количества символов, добавляя индикатор скрытых символов.

functions.name: _extract_search_results
functions.description: Извлекает и форматирует заголовки и ссылки из XML-результатов поиска, ограничивая количество выводимых результатов, использует регулярные выражения для извлечения данных.

functions.name: print_code_block
functions.description: Displays a code block with syntax highlighting and optional file path title, using the Monokai theme and line numbers.

functions.name: print_diff_preview
functions.description: Displays a colored preview of file changes (diffs) using rich formatting, highlighting added, removed, and context lines.

functions.name: print_validation_result
functions.description: Отображает результаты валидации в консоли с поддержкой перевода сообщений об ошибках, использует библиотеку rich для форматированного вывода.

functions.name: print_runtime_test_summary
functions.description: Отображает подробный отчет о результатах runtime-тестирования, включая статистику, детали по файлам и причины пропусков, используя библиотеку rich для форматированного вывода в консоль.

functions.name: print_error
functions.description: Displays an error message in a formatted panel with a red theme and a warning icon. Integrates with a console and color constants for consistent UI output.

functions.name: print_success
functions.description: Displays a success message in the console with a green panel and checkmark icon. Uses rich's Panel for styling and COLOR constants for theming.

functions.name: print_info
functions.description: Displays an informational message in the console with a title and a border styled for visual clarity.

functions.name: print_warning
functions.description: Displays a warning message in the console with a yellow color and a warning icon, using a formatted panel for visual clarity.

functions.name: truncate_text
functions.description: Truncates text to a specified maximum length and appends a suffix if needed.

functions.name: format_message_preview
functions.description: Форматирует текст сообщения, убирает лишние пробелы и переносы строк, и обрезает его до указанного максимального количества символов для отображения превью. Использует регулярные выражения для очистки текста и функцию truncate_text для обрезки.

functions.name: extract_code_blocks_from_response
functions.description: Извлекает блоки кода из текста, поддерживает формат с указанием файла и язык программирования, использует регулярные выражения для поиска.

functions.name: extract_status_from_agent_response
functions.description: Извлекает статус из текстового ответа агента на основе ключевых слов, возвращая соответствующее сообщение или None.

functions.name: display_thread_history
functions.description: Отображает историю сообщений в указанном потоке диалога в зависимости от режима, используя асинхронный доступ к данным и форматирование вывода в консоль.

functions.name: _display_agent_response
functions.description: Отображает ответ агента с выделением статуса и блоков кода, используя библиотеку Rich для форматированного вывода в консоль.

functions.name: get_thread_preview
functions.description: Возвращает краткое превью последнего сообщения в потоке для отображения в списке диалогов, используя HistoryManager.

functions.name: handle_validator_rejection
functions.description: Обрабатывает отклонение кода AI Validator, отображая пользователю вердикт валидатора и решение Оркестратора, интегрируется с AgentPipeline и интерфейсом пользователя для выбора дальнейших действий.

functions.name: _get_user_custom_critique
functions.description: Handles user feedback by collecting custom critiques, validating them through a full processing cycle, and returning updated code if successful. Integrates with AgentPipeline for processing and console for user interaction.

functions.name: print_model_selection_menu
functions.description: Выводит меню выбора моделей с краткими или полными описаниями в зависимости от режима, поддерживает автоматический роутер и фиксированные модели.

functions.name: get_model_short_name
functions.description: Returns the short name of a model based on its ID, using predefined configurations or falling back to a display name from the configuration.

functions.name: get_generator_model_short_name
functions.description: Returns the short name of a generator model based on its ID by searching through available models or falling back to a configuration lookup.

functions.name: print_generator_model_selection_menu
functions.description: Displays a menu of available code generator models with their descriptions, supporting a compact mode for shorter summaries. Uses console output for formatting options and descriptions.

functions.name: select_generator_model
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю интерактивно выбрать модель генератора кода, обновляя текущее состояние и пересоздавая pipeline при необходимости. Интегрируется с state, console, prompt_with_navigation и AVAILABLE_GENERATOR_MODELS.

functions.name: select_orchestrator_model
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю интерактивно выбрать модель оркестратора или включить автоматический роутер, отображая подробные описания, интегрируется с state для хранения настроек.

functions.name: toggle_type_checking
functions.description: Переключает проверку типов (mypy) включая/выключая её, выводит статус и информацию о проверках, а также сбрасывает pipeline при изменении настроек. Интегрируется с state и console для управления состоянием и вывода сообщений.

functions.name: select_project_type
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю выбрать тип проекта (существующий или новый) через интерактивное меню, возвращает соответствующую строку или None при отмене. Использует prompt_with_navigation для получения выбора и может выбрасывать исключения для навигации.

functions.name: select_existing_project
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю выбрать существующий проект из текущей директории, недавних проектов или вручную, интегрируется с HistoryManager и консольным интерфейсом.

functions.name: create_new_project
functions.description: Создаёт новую директорию для проекта с возможностью указания пути пользователем, возвращает абсолютный путь или None в случае ошибки. Интегрируется с функцией prompt_with_navigation для ввода пути и использует os для создания директории.

functions.name: build_project_indexes
functions.description: Создаёт или обновляет индекс проекта для последующего анализа, используя FullIndexBuilder для новых проектов и IncrementalIndexUpdater для существующих, с отображением прогресса и статистики. Интегрируется с консольным интерфейсом и логированием ошибок.

functions.name: load_project_index
functions.description: Загружает семантический индекс проекта из JSON-файла, возвращает пустой словарь при отсутствии или ошибке, интегрируется с логированием и выводом сообщений в консоль.

functions.name: run_incremental_update
functions.description: Performs incremental index updates for a project, logging and displaying changes if any; returns True on success or False if an error occurs. Integrates with IncrementalIndexUpdater and logging/console for status reporting.

functions.name: create_new_thread
functions.description: Создаёт новый диалог с уникальным заголовком на основе текущего состояния, используя history_manager; интегрируется с state и console для управления и вывода информации.

functions.name: find_or_create_thread_for_project
functions.description: Поиск существующего диалога (треда) для проекта или создание нового, с отображением превью и историей. Интегрируется с state.history_manager, console, Table и prompt_with_navigation.

functions.name: select_thread
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю выбрать существующий диалог из истории, отображая превью последнего сообщения, интегрируется с HistoryManager и консольным интерфейсом.

functions.name: load_conversation_history
functions.description: Загружает и преобразует историю беседы из текущей сессии для отображения, включая информацию о сжатии, если оно применялось. Интегрируется с HistoryManager, логирует статистику и поддерживает отображение в консоли.

functions.name: view_history
functions.description: Отображает полную историю текущего диалога с различными типами сообщений (пользователь, ассистент, инструмент, система), включая форматирование, обрезку текста и поддержку Markdown, интегрируется с state.history_manager и state.current_thread.

functions.name: export_dialog_to_markdown
functions.description: Экспортирует текущий диалог в формате Markdown с метаданными и разметкой сообщений, сохраняя результат в файл. Использует datetime для временных меток, re для очистки названия файла, и логику из state для получения истории сообщений.

functions.name: rename_current_thread
functions.description: Позволяет переименовать текущий активный диалог, взаимодействуя с менеджером истории для обновления названия в базе данных.

functions.name: generate_thread_title_from_query
functions.description: Генерирует заголовок диалога на основе пользовательского запроса, обрезая его до 50 символов и добавляя временные метки при необходимости.

functions.name: update_thread_title_if_first_message
functions.description: Updates the thread title based on the user's first message, using the history manager to check message count and set a new title if applicable.

functions.name: save_attached_files_to_history
functions.description: Сохраняет прикреплённые файлы в историю беседы в виде сообщений пользователя, включая метаданные и ограничения по размеру. Интегрируется с history_manager для добавления сообщений в поток.

functions.name: attach_files
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю прикреплять файлы для обработки в General Chat, подсчитывая токены и проверяя лимиты, интегрируется с TokenCounter и state.

functions.name: _read_file_content
functions.description: Асинхронно читает содержимое файла в зависимости от его расширения, поддерживает текстовые файлы, PDF и DOCX, использует соответствующие библиотеки для извлечения текста.

functions.name: handle_ask_mode
functions.description: Обрабатывает режим "Вопросы" для анализа кода и генерации кода с копированием, используя Router → Pre-filter → Orchestrator → Code Generator, с подробным логированием и сохранением результатов в историю. Интеграции: load_semantic_index, pre_filter_chunks, orchestrate, generate_code, history_manager.

functions.name: handle_agent_mode
functions.description: Обрабатывает автономную генерацию кода в режиме агента с валидацией, интегрирует инструменты для анализа, генерации, тестирования и применения изменений в проекте.

functions.name: handle_general_chat
functions.description: Обрабатывает запросы в режиме общего чата, используя оркестратор GeneralChatOrchestrator, сохраняет историю диалога и файлы, интегрируется с history_manager и инструментами для генерации ответов.

functions.name: chat_loop
functions.description: Основной асинхронный цикл чата, обрабатывающий ввод пользователя, команды и взаимодействие с AI, интегрируется с состоянием приложения (state), консольным интерфейсом (console) и логированием (logger).

functions.name: handle_chat_command
functions.description: Обрабатывает слэш-команды в чате, такие как выход, переход в меню, экспорт, управление диалогами и моделями, интегрируясь с состоянием, консолью и вспомогательными функциями.

functions.name: handle_restore_command
functions.description: Восстанавливает данные из предыдущего бэкапа, позволяет просматривать доступные сессии и подтверждать восстановление, интегрируется с backup_manager и консольным интерфейсом.

functions.name: handle_changes_command
functions.description: Отображает историю изменений файлов или текущего диалога, включая типы изменений, количество строк, статус и связанные диалоги, с поддержкой вывода в виде таблицы и подсказками по командам. Интегрируется с state.history_manager и state.current_thread.

functions.name: print_chat_help
functions.description: Выводит справочную информацию по доступным командам чата в формате Markdown с описанием функционала и навигации, используя библиотеки rich для форматированного вывода.

functions.name: setup_mode_session
functions.description: Настраивает сессию в зависимости от выбранного режима (ask, agent, general), включая выбор проекта, модели оркестратора и генератора, индексацию и отображение интерфейса. Интегрируется с консольным вводом, менеджером состояния и модулями проекта.

functions.name: main_menu_loop
functions.description: Главный асинхронный цикл меню приложения, обрабатывающий выбор пользователя и запускающий соответствующие режимы работы, такие как чат, история, настройки и выход. Интегрируется с Prompt, console, state, setup_mode_session, chat_loop и другими модулями для управления интерфейсом и логикой приложения.

functions.name: initialize
functions.description: Инициализирует менеджер истории в асинхронном режиме, логирует результат и выводит предупреждение в случае ошибки.

functions.name: shutdown
functions.description: Performs cleanup operations during shutdown, including printing status messages and discarding pending pipeline changes if available. Integrates with state.pipeline and console for output.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Служит главной точкой входа в асинхронное приложение, инициализирует систему, запускает цикл меню и обрабатывает критические ошибки.

functions.name: get_project_path
functions.description: Path resolution utility for project scanning that prioritizes command-line arguments over interactive input, with fallback to current directory.

functions.name: count_file_tokens
functions.description: Token counting utility for text files with fallback encoding support, integrates with tokenizer for NLP preprocessing workflows.

functions.name: get_file_icon
functions.description: Returns a file type icon as a string based on the given file type, used for visual representation in file listings or reports. Integrates with rich.console and rich.table for enhanced terminal output.

functions.name: build_folder_tree
functions.description: Generates a visual folder tree structure from a list of files with token counts, using color-coded tokens and file icons for clarity. Integrates with rich for styled console output and pathlib for path handling.

functions.name: run_full_test
functions.description: Executes a full system test for code chunking, scanning and analyzing a project's structure, tokenizing files, and generating detailed reports and statistics; integrates with ProjectScanner, FileTypeDetector, TokenCounter, and visualization tools like rich.console and rich.table.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Тестирует обработку файла через XMLWrapper и отправку его в AI-модель (DeepSeek или OpenRouter), сохраняя результат в Markdown-файл. Интеграции: XMLWrapper, AIService, логирование и файловая система.

functions.name: print_header
functions.description: Prints a formatted header with the given text, surrounded by equals signs and styled using color codes for visual emphasis in test output.

functions.name: print_success
functions.description: Prints a success message with a green checkmark prefix for visual clarity in test outputs.

functions.name: print_error
functions.description: Logging utility for color-coded error output to stdout, integrates with custom terminal color constants.

functions.name: print_warning
functions.description: Prints warning messages to the console with a yellow color prefix and a warning symbol. Used for visual distinction in test output.

functions.name: print_info
functions.description: Logging utility for color-coded informational console output, integrates with a custom Colors class for terminal formatting.

functions.name: check_imports
functions.description: Dynamic import validation utility for verifying module dependencies in a code indexing system, integrated with a custom test logging framework.

functions.name: check_api_qwen
functions.description: API health check for Qwen via OpenRouter, returns status and diagnostic message with HTTP client integration.

functions.name: check_api_deepseek
functions.description: API health check for DeepSeek service using httpx, returns connection status and diagnostic message.

functions.name: check_apis
functions.description: API connectivity test suite for Qwen and DeepSeek endpoints, returning boolean status dictionary with integrated test logging.

functions.name: list_python_files
functions.description: Recursively enumerates Python files in a directory tree while filtering out ignored and hidden directories, returning a list of Path objects.

functions.name: count_all_files
functions.description: Recursively counts all non-hidden files in a directory tree, excluding specified directories, and returns the total integer count.

functions.name: select_directory
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю интерактивно выбрать директорию для индексации, проверяет её существование и выводит статистику файлов.

functions.name: select_mode
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю интерактивно выбрать режим работы индексации, возвращая строковое значение ("full", "sync", "check", "stats") в зависимости от выбора. Использует цветовую кодировку для улучшения читаемости меню.

functions.name: run_full_indexing
functions.description: Executes a full indexing process using IndexManager, tracking progress and results, and validates generated index files. Integrates with TestLogger for detailed logging and ProgressTracker for status updates.

functions.name: run_incremental_sync
functions.description: Executes an incremental index synchronization for a given target path, logging progress and results; integrates with IncrementalIndexUpdater and a TestLogger for tracking and reporting.

functions.name: show_index_stats
functions.description: Выводит статистику индексов в указанной директории, включая количество токенов, размер файлов и дополнительную информацию о содержимом, интегрируется с TokenCounter и TestLogger.

functions.name: print_full_results
functions.description: Выводит статистику и результаты полной индексации проекта, включая время выполнения, количество обработанных файлов, классов, функций и токенов, а также информацию об ошибках и сжатии индекса.

functions.name: print_sync_results
functions.description: Выводит статистику и результаты синхронизации файлов в цветном текстовом формате, включая успешные изменения, ошибки и данные по AI-описаниям.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Выполняет тестирование и индексацию файлов в указанной директории, поддерживает режимы проверки, статистики, полной индексации и синхронизации, интегрируется с API (DeepSeek, Qwen) и логирует результаты.

functions.name: print_header
functions.description: Prints a formatted header with the given text, centered and surrounded by lines, using ANSI color codes for styling.

functions.name: print_success
functions.description: Logging utility for colored terminal output, integrates with a custom Colors class for status indication.

functions.name: print_error
functions.description: Error logging utility for terminal output with color-coded formatting, integrates with a custom Colors class for standardized error display.

functions.name: print_warning
functions.description: Logging utility for color-coded warning messages in terminal output, integrates with a custom color enumeration for standardized formatting.

functions.name: print_info
functions.description: Logging utility for color-coded informational messages in terminal output, integrates with a custom Colors class for ANSI formatting.

functions.name: check_imports
functions.description: Dependency validation utility for module imports, outputs success/error messages and returns boolean pass/fail status.

functions.name: check_api_qwen
functions.description: Health check for Qwen API via OpenRouter, validates configuration and connectivity with a test request.

functions.name: check_api_deepseek
functions.description: API health check for DeepSeek service using httpx, returns status and diagnostic message.

functions.name: list_python_files
functions.description: Recursively enumerates Python files from a target directory while filtering out entries in IGNORE_DIRS and hidden directories.

functions.name: count_tasks
functions.description: Estimates total tasks for progress tracking by recursively counting classes and functions in Python files using a semantic chunker.

functions.name: select_directory
functions.description: Prompts the user to select a directory for indexing, validates the selection, and returns the chosen path if valid. Integrates with file system checks and Python file listing.

functions.name: select_mode
functions.description: Предоставляет пользователю выбор режима индексации (инкрементальный, полный или тест обнаружения изменений) с цветным текстовым интерфейсом.

functions.name: select_concurrency
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю задать уровень параллелизма для API-запросов с валидацией и ограничением диапазона.

functions.name: test_change_detection
functions.description: Тестирует функционал обнаружения изменений в файловой системе, проверяя метод detect_changed_files(), хэширование, наличие индекса и вспомогательных методов. Интегрируется с SemanticIndexer и ContentHasher.

functions.name: select_mode
functions.description: Предоставляет пользователю выбор режима индексации (инкрементальный, полный, тест обнаружения изменений, синхронизация) и возвращает выбранный режим.

functions.name: test_incremental_update
functions.description: Тестирует наличие и корректность метода update_single_file в SemanticIndexer для инкрементального обновления, интегрируется с логированием и проверкой сигнатуры метода.

functions.name: build_with_progress
functions.description: Executes semantic indexing asynchronously with progress tracking, integrates with SemanticIndexer and ProgressTracker for task monitoring and status updates.

functions.name: analyze_result
functions.description: Выводит статистику индексации, включая количество файлов, классов, функций и успешность API-вызовов, а также информацию о размерах созданных файлов и ошибках. Интегрируется с Qwen и DeepSeek для анализа API-запросов.

functions.name: show_sample_output
functions.description: Displays a sample output from a compact index file (up to 20 lines), with visual formatting and truncation if the file is longer. Integrates with file system and color formatting for terminal output.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Запускает тестирование и построение семантического индекса, интегрируя проверки API, выбор режима, синхронизацию и индексацию с поддержкой асинхронности и прогресса.

functions.name: hello_world
functions.description: Prints 'Hello, World!' to the console.

functions.name: test_python
functions.description: Тестирует Python-чанкер на примере кода, отображая результаты в виде таблицы с информацией о типе, имени, строках и токенах каждого чанка. Использует SmartPythonChunker, Pathlib для работы с файлами и Rich для визуализации.

functions.name: test_go
functions.description: Unit test for Go code chunking functionality using SmartGoChunker, validates parsing accuracy and displays structured results via rich console output.

functions.name: test_sql
functions.description: Тестирует SQL-чанкер на примере SQL-скрипта, выводя информацию о сгенерированных чанках и группировке по таблицам с использованием Rich для форматированного вывода.

functions.name: select_project_directory
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю выбрать директорию проекта для индексации, с поддержкой предопределенных путей и пользовательского ввода, включая проверку существования и корректности пути.

functions.name: create_test_project
functions.description: Создает структуру тестового проекта с исходными файлами и тестами для проверки функциональности, включая пользовательскую логику, администрирование и модульные тесты.

functions.name: check_project_structure
functions.description: Проверяет структуру проекта, подсчитывает Python-файлы и оценивает общий размер кода в токенах, интегрируясь с TokenCounter для анализа содержимого.

functions.name: confirm_indexing
functions.description: Запрашивает подтверждение начала индексации проекта, отображая статистику и предупреждения, возвращает результат выбора пользователя.

functions.name: build_index
functions.description: Project indexing function that scans directories, analyzes code structure, and outputs JSON metadata with execution statistics.

functions.name: show_results
functions.description: Console output formatter for indexing results, displays statistics and structured file metadata with error handling.

functions.name: check_index_file
functions.description: Index validation utility for JSON-based file maps, performs structural integrity checks and provides diagnostic output.

functions.name: main
functions.description: CLI-based project index builder for generating detailed code structure maps, integrates with file system validation and user confirmation workflows.

functions.name: _is_network_error
functions.description: Determines if an exception is a network-related error that can be retried, by checking both the error message and exception type against known network error patterns.

functions.name: _autofix_response_ask
functions.description: Автоматически исправляет типичные структурные ошибки в ответе в режиме ASK, такие как маркеры файлов, языков и действий, а также незакрытые секции. Возвращает исправленный текст и список решенных проблем.

functions.name: _infer_and_add_action_ask
functions.description: Infers and adds an appropriate ACTION (NEW_FILE, REPLACE_FILE, or REPLACE_METHOD) to code blocks in ASK mode responses based on file context, modifies the response text accordingly, and returns a list of inferred actions. Uses regex to identify file blocks and determine action type.

functions.name: _convert_markdown_to_markers_ask
functions.description: Converts markdown code blocks into structured marker blocks for code modification (ASK mode fallback), extracting file paths, context, and language to generate actionable code markers.

functions.name: _validate_parsed_blocks_ask
functions.description: Validates parsed code blocks in ASK mode, checking for empty blocks, truncation, and missing action markers. Returns validation result with errors or warnings.

functions.name: _looks_truncated_ask
functions.description: Determines if a code snippet is likely truncated in ASK mode by checking for incomplete syntax patterns in the last line.

functions.name: _build_retry_prompt_ask
functions.description: Constructs a retry prompt for code generation in ASK mode, including the original instruction, error message, and a snippet of the previous response, formatted to enforce a specific code submission structure.

functions.name: parse_marker_format_ask
functions.description: Parses a response formatted with # === FILE: ... === markers to extract code blocks and their metadata (ASK mode only), returning a list of CodeBlock objects and an explanation. Uses regular expressions to identify file paths, language, context, action, target, and code content.

functions.name: generate_code
functions.description: Generates code in ASK mode using an LLM with validation, retry logic, and model-specific adjustments, integrating with prompt formatting, response parsing, and logging.

functions.name: generate_code_agent_mode
functions.description: Generates code in Agent Mode using an LLM, returning parsed code blocks for file modification and the raw response for logging. Integrates with file context, LLM models, and includes retry logic for network errors.

functions.name: _parse_code_generator_response
functions.description: Parses a Code Generator response into structured code blocks and explanation, using default filepath if unspecified. Integrates with _extract_code_blocks and _extract_explanation helper functions.

functions.name: _extract_code_blocks
functions.description: Extracts code blocks from a response string, identifying language, filepath, and context from comments, and returns them as structured CodeBlock objects.

functions.name: _extract_explanation
functions.description: Extracts the explanation section from a response by searching for common explanation headers and content after code blocks, removing any code blocks from the result.

functions.name: _extract_any_code
functions.description: Extracts code-like content from a response using regex patterns for indented blocks or common code delimiters. Used as a fallback when standard parsing methods fail.

functions.name: parse_ask_mode_code_blocks
functions.description: Parses code blocks from ASK mode responses using either marker or markdown format, extracting code, file paths, language, and context, and returns them as structured CodeBlock objects along with a summary log. Integrates with logging and regex-based content extraction.

functions.name: _extract_code_fences_smart
functions.description: Извлекает блоки кода в формате code fences из текста, учитывая вложенные конструкции и язык программирования, возвращает список с языком, содержимым и позициями блоков. Интегрируется с регулярными выражениями и пользовательскими функциями логирования.

functions.name: _find_closing_fence_improved
functions.description: Finds the position of a closing ``` fence in a text, with improved logic to ensure it's on a separate line and handles Python string literals correctly.

functions.name: _find_closing_fence
functions.description: Находит позицию закрывающего ``` в тексте, учитывая строковые литералы и escape-последовательности, чтобы избежать ложных срабатываний внутри кода или строк.

functions.name: extract_explanation_from_response
functions.description: Extracts the explanation section from a response string using specific markers or a fallback method. Used in ASK mode for both modern and legacy formats.

functions.name: parse_agent_code_blocks
functions.description: Parses agent mode code blocks from a response string into structured ParsedCodeBlock objects for file modification. Integrates with regular expressions for metadata extraction and code validation.

functions.name: _extract_field
functions.description: Extracts the value of a specified field from a code block content using multiple formatting patterns. Supports formats like FIELD: value, FIELD:value, and FIELD: value.

functions.name: _extract_code_from_block
functions.description: Extracts code from a fenced code block () in a string, handling edge cases like escaped fences inside strings or regex patterns.

functions.name: format_code_blocks_summary
functions.description: Formats a list of parsed code blocks into a human-readable summary string for logging or UI display, including file path, mode, target elements, and code size.

functions.name: validate_indentation
functions.description: Validates and fixes code indentation by ensuring consistency between spaces and tabs, and adjusts indentation based on context if provided.

functions.name: generate_code_simple
functions.description: Provides a simplified interface for code generation, returning only the generated code and explanation; integrates with the full generate_code logic and CodeGeneratorResult internally.

functions.name: format_result_for_display
functions.description: Formats a CodeGeneratorResult object into a user-readable string for display in ASK mode.

functions.name: read_file_tool
functions.description: Reads a file from a project directory and returns its content wrapped in XML with metadata like file type, token count, and line numbers, ensuring security checks and encoding handling. Integrates with token counting, file type detection, and XML formatting utilities.

functions.name: read_file_raw
functions.description: Reads a file from a project directory with security checks, returns structured results including content, line numbers (optional), token count, and file type. Integrates with FileTypeDetector and TokenCounter for analysis.

functions.name: _format_error
functions.description: Generates a formatted XML-like error message with a suggestion for file-related issues.

functions.name: _add_line_numbers
functions.description: Adds line numbers to the given string content, formatting them to align right based on the total number of lines.

functions.name: _truncate_to_tokens
functions.description: Truncates text content to stay within a specified token limit, using a token counter to estimate line lengths. Returns the truncated content with a truncation message if cut off.

functions.name: search_code_tool
functions.description: Searches a project's semantic index for code elements (classes, functions, methods) matching a query, with options to filter by type and limit results; returns formatted XML output. Integrates with logging and helper functions for error/result formatting.

functions.name: _search_unified_index
functions.description: Performs a unified search on either a regular or compressed code index, returning relevant search results based on the query and search type. Integrates with _search_compressed_index_unified and _search_regular_index_unified for index-specific searching.

functions.name: _search_regular_index_unified
functions.description: Searches a regular (non-compressed) code index for classes, functions, or methods based on a query, returning matching results with file paths, line numbers, and context. Integrates with _parse_lines and _parse_methods_list for line parsing and method formatting.

functions.name: _search_compressed_index_unified
functions.description: Searches a compressed code index for classes, functions, or methods based on a query, returning structured search results. Integrates with SearchResult objects and line parsing for file navigation.

functions.name: _parse_methods_list
functions.description: Parses a list of methods from various input formats (string, list of strings, or list of dictionaries), extracting method names.

functions.name: _parse_lines
functions.description: Parses line numbers from various input formats including strings, integers, and dictionaries, returning a tuple of start and end line numbers.

functions.name: _format_results_xml
functions.description: Formats search results into an XML string, grouping results by file and including details like type, name, line numbers, context, and methods for classes.

functions.name: _format_no_results
functions.description: Generates a formatted XML/HTML message when no code search results are found, including helpful suggestions for improving the query.

functions.name: _format_error
functions.description: Formats an error message into an XML structure for output, escaping any XML special characters.

functions.name: _escape_xml
functions.description: Escapes special XML characters in a string to ensure safe XML output. Replaces &, <, >, ", and ' with their corresponding XML entities.

functions.name: search_code_tool_legacy
functions.description: Provides backward compatibility for the legacy search_code_tool interface by delegating to the updated search_code_tool function.

functions.name: get_tool_by_name
functions.description: Retrieves a predefined tool configuration by name from a map of available tools.

functions.name: get_tool_names

functions.name: web_search_tool
