functions.name: _async_web_search
functions.description: Performs an asynchronous web search using DuckDuckGo, filters and ranks results by semantic relevance, and returns the most relevant pages within a token limit. Integrates with parallel page fetching and relevance scoring.

functions.name: _duckduckgo_search
functions.description: Performs asynchronous web searches using DuckDuckGo's HTML interface, returning a list of search results with URLs and metadata. Uses httpx for HTTP requests and parses HTML content to extract results.

functions.name: _parse_duckduckgo_html
functions.description: Parses DuckDuckGo HTML search results to extract URLs, titles, and snippets, using regex patterns and URL validation. Integrates with helper functions for URL extraction and validation.

functions.name: _extract_actual_url
functions.description: Extracts the actual URL from a DuckDuckGo redirect link by parsing the uddg parameter and handling URL formatting.

functions.name: _is_valid_url
functions.description: Validates URLs by checking for valid scheme and netloc, and skips URLs from specified domains.

functions.name: _fetch_pages_parallel
functions.description: Fetches multiple web pages in parallel from search results, handling errors, token counting, and content truncation; uses asyncio for concurrency and returns a list of successfully fetched WebPage objects.

functions.name: _fetch_page_content
functions.description: Fetches and extracts text content from a web page using an asynchronous HTTP client, with error handling and custom headers for request compatibility.

functions.name: _extract_text_from_html
functions.description: Extracts clean, readable text from HTML by removing scripts, styles, comments, and tags, while preserving paragraph structure and decoding HTML entities.

functions.name: _decode_html_entities
functions.description: Decodes common and numeric HTML entities in a string to their corresponding characters.

functions.name: _calculate_relevance_scores
functions.description: Calculates relevance scores for web pages based on keyword matches in title, snippet, and content, with bonuses for exact phrases and programming domains. Returns the pages with updated relevance scores.

functions.name: _select_within_token_limit
functions.description: Selects the top web pages while staying within a specified token limit, truncating content if necessary to fit. Integrates with TokenCounter for token estimation.

functions.name: _truncate_content
functions.description: Truncates text content by paragraphs to stay within a specified token limit, using a provided token counter. Returns the truncated content with a truncation notice if necessary.

functions.name: _format_results_xml
functions.description: Formats web search results into an XML string, including query metadata, page rankings, and escaped content.

functions.name: _format_no_results
functions.description: Generates an XML-formatted response message when no web search results are found, including suggestions for improving the query.

functions.name: _format_error
functions.description: Formats an error message into an XML structure for output, escaping any XML special characters.

functions.name: _escape_xml
functions.description: Escapes special XML characters in a string to ensure safe XML formatting. Replaces &, <, >, and " with their corresponding XML entities.

functions.name: print_header
functions.description: Prints a header with a border using a specified character and color, centered within a fixed width.

functions.name: print_subheader
functions.description: Prints a formatted subheader with bold text and decorative lines for visual separation in test output.

functions.name: print_success
functions.description: Prints a success message with a green checkmark and resets the text color.

functions.name: print_error
functions.description: Prints an error message with a red color and a cross symbol for visual emphasis.

functions.name: print_warning
functions.description: Prints a warning message with a yellow color and warning emoji.

functions.name: print_info
functions.description: Prints informational messages with a blue color and an info emoji.

functions.name: print_step
functions.description: Prints the progress of a step in a test process with colored output.

functions.name: print_result
functions.description: Prints a formatted test result line with a label, value, and color-coded success status.

functions.name: print_json
functions.description: Prints formatted JSON with optional indentation and color styling using the Colors class.

functions.name: print_code_block
functions.description: Prints a code block with syntax highlighting, optionally showing the file path and limiting output to the first 30 lines.

functions.name: save_json_report
functions.description: Saves a detailed test report in JSON format, organizing test metadata, orchestrator analysis, code generation results, and model information into a structured file.

functions.name: save_markdown_report
functions.description: Сохраняет результаты тестирования AI-агента в формате Markdown-отчета, включая запрос пользователя, анализ, сгенерированный код, пояснения и вызовы инструментов. Интегрируется с файловой системой для хранения отчетов в указанной директории.

functions.name: setup_logging
functions.description: Configures logging with colored output and optional verbose level, suppresses noise from httpx and httpcore libraries.

functions.name: test_imports
functions.description: Тестирует корректность импорта модулей и атрибутов, используемых в агентах и связанных компонентах, и формирует отчет в виде тестового набора.

functions.name: test_api_connectivity
functions.description: Тестирует подключение к API различных LLM-провайдеров, отправляя тестовые запросы и проверяя ответы, интегрируется с call_llm и конфигурацией из cfg.

functions.name: test_router
functions.description: Тестирует агент Router на наборе запросов, проверяя маршрутизацию задач между моделями, интегрируется с route_request и формирует отчет в виде TestSuite.

functions.name: test_pre_filter
functions.description: Тестирует работу агента Pre-filter на реальном проекте, проверяя загрузку семантического индекса и выполнение пре-фильтрации для примеров запросов. Интегрируется с pre_filter_chunks и load_semantic_index.

functions.name: test_orchestrator
functions.description: Тестирует работу агента Orchestrator с реальным проектом, включая загрузку данных, пре-фильтрацию чанков и выполнение оркестрации, интегрируясь с индексом, картой проекта и моделью оркестратора.

functions.name: test_code_generator
functions.description: Тестирует функциональность агента Code Generator на генерацию кода, форматирование результатов и сериализацию в JSON, используя разные сценарии задач. Интегрируется с классами тестирования и модулем генерации кода.

functions.name: test_integration
functions.description: Выполняет полный интеграционный тест пайплайна: Router → Pre-filter → Orchestrator → Code Generator, включая генерацию и отображение кода, с сохранением результатов в JSON и Markdown форматах.

functions.name: print_menu
functions.description: Отображает главное меню с доступными тестами для агентов, используя цветовую кодировку и описание каждого теста.

functions.name: select_directory
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю интерактивно выбрать директорию проекта, проверяя её существование и наличие семантического индекса.

functions.name: get_user_query
functions.description: Предлагает пользователю ввести запрос для интеграционного теста, с возможностью выбора из предложенных вариантов.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Главная асинхронная точка входа для запуска тестов агентов, включая импорты, API, Router, Pre-filter, Orchestrator, Code Generator и интеграционные тесты, с интерактивным меню и выводом результатов.

functions.name: test_model
functions.description: Tests a model via OpenRouter API using an async HTTP client, returns status, response, error details, and latency. Integrates with httpx for requests and handles various error types including timeouts, rate limits, and geo-blocking.

functions.name: run_all_tests
functions.description: Тестирует доступность AI-моделей через OpenRouter API, выводит результаты с деталями статусов и рекомендациями, используя httpx для асинхронных запросов и asyncio для управления задержками.

functions.name: test
functions.description: Tests the LLM integration for the 'pre_filter' role using DeepSeek, verifying the model name, API URL, key, and response handling.

functions.name: test
functions.description: Tests the minimal pre-filter LLM workflow by checking the model configuration and making a simple JSON response request, using call_llm and displaying execution time and results.

functions.name: _contains_code_block
functions.description: Проверяет наличие блоков кода в формате Markdown с использованием тройных обратных кавычек, избегая проблем с экранированием.

functions.name: compress_history_if_needed
functions.description: Compresses message history if total token count exceeds a dynamic threshold, preserving the last N messages and compressing older ones using an LLM. Integrates with TokenCounter, CompressionStats, and model-specific configurations.

functions.name: _compress_message
functions.description: Сжимает сообщения с помощью LLM, используя специализированные промпты, пропуская уже сжатые сообщения и сообщения с кодом; интегрируется с конфигурацией моделей и логированием.

functions.name: prune_irrelevant_context
functions.description: Удаляет из истории сообщений нерелевантные результаты инструментов, основываясь на файлах, упомянутых в текущем запросе. Использует регулярные выражения для извлечения файлов и подсчет токенов для оптимизации.

functions.name: setup_logging
functions.description: Configures colored logging with custom SUCCESS level and timestamps, setting up consistent log formatting and handlers for multiple logger names. Integrates with Python's logging module and standard output.

functions.name: test_imports
functions.description: Tests the successful import of key modules and components used in the history management system, logging results and returning a boolean status. Integrates with logging for detailed test feedback.

functions.name: test_api_connection
functions.description: Tests the API connection for history compression by calling an LLM with a test message, logs the result, and returns connection success status. Integrates with call_llm from app.llm.api_client and uses logging for status tracking.

functions.name: test_create_history
functions.description: Creates and tests a conversation thread with sample messages using HistoryManager, including thread creation, message addition, and validation, with logging and error handling. Integrates with TokenCounter for token tracking and uses a test SQLite database.

functions.name: test_history_compression
functions.description: Tests dynamic history compression in a HistoryManager by adding messages until a token threshold is exceeded, then invoking compress_history_if_needed to verify compression behavior. Integrates with TokenCounter for token estimation and logging for detailed diagnostics.

functions.name: test_prune_context
functions.description: Tests the pruning of irrelevant tool results from a message history based on a user query, ensuring only contextually relevant files (e.g., auth.py) are retained while others are marked as pruned. Integrates with logging for test progress and error tracking.

functions.name: cleanup_test_database
functions.description: Deletes the test database file after forcing garbage collection and waiting for file locks to release, primarily for Windows compatibility; returns a boolean indicating success or failure.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs a test suite for history management functionality, including import checks, API connection, history creation, compression, context pruning, and cleanup, with logging and result reporting.

functions.name: test_caching_logic
functions.description: Tests caching logic for tool responses based on model and function type, ensuring cache_control is added for Claude models handling heavy tools like read_file.

functions.name: create_test_file
functions.description: Generates a test file containing a repetitive DataProcessor class definition to simulate a heavy file for caching tests.

functions.name: cleanup
functions.description: Deletes the test file if it exists, used for cleaning up after tests.

functions.name: intercepted_call
functions.description: Intercepts and checks for cache_control in tool messages of an LLM call, logging success or failure, then proceeds with the original API call to maintain workflow.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs tests for multiple models by orchestrating a simulated LLM call, intercepting responses and logging results, with setup and cleanup of test files. Integrates with orchestrate and call_llm_with_tools.

functions.name: general_web_search_tool
functions.description: Performs a general web search with options for result count, time limit, and region, using asynchronous execution safely in any context. Integrates with logging and error formatting utilities.

functions.name: general_web_search_tool_sync
functions.description: Provides a synchronous alias for the general_web_search_tool function for backward compatibility.

functions.name: async_general_web_search
functions.description: Performs an asynchronous general web search using DuckDuckGo, fetches and ranks relevant pages, and selects results within a token limit. Integrates with parallel fetching, relevance scoring, and token-based result trimming.

functions.name: duckduckgo_search
functions.description: Performs asynchronous web searches using DuckDuckGo via HTTP POST requests, supporting region and time-based filtering, and returns parsed search results as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: parse_ddg_html
functions.description: Parses HTML search results from DuckDuckGo, extracting URLs, titles, and snippets into a structured list of dictionaries. Uses regex for parsing and includes URL validation and HTML tag cleaning.

functions.name: remove_html_tags
functions.description: Removes HTML tags from a given string using regular expressions.

functions.name: extract_actual_url
functions.description: Extracts the actual URL from a DuckDuckGo search redirect link by parsing the uddg parameter, returning the decoded URL if found or the original if not.

functions.name: is_valid_url
functions.description: Validates if a given string is a well-formed URL and not pointing to common document or archive file types.

functions.name: fetch_pages_parallel
functions.description: Fetches web pages in parallel from search results using asyncio, filters out empty or errored pages, and returns up to the specified maximum number of valid pages.

functions.name: fetch_single_page
functions.description: Fetches and processes the content of a single web page, truncating it if it exceeds a token limit, and returns a GeneralWebPage object with the results.

functions.name: fetch_page_content
functions.description: Fetches and extracts text content from a webpage asynchronously using HTTPX, with custom headers and timeout; returns empty string on failure.

functions.name: extract_text_from_html
functions.description: Extracts and cleans text from HTML by removing specific tags and unnecessary whitespace, while preserving line breaks and decoding HTML entities.

functions.name: truncate_content
functions.description: Performs binary search to truncate text content precisely within a token limit using a provided token counter. Used to ensure content fits within a specified token budget for tasks like prompt engineering or API input preparation.

functions.name: calculate_relevance_scores
functions.description: Calculates relevance scores for web pages based on Jaccard similarity between query and page title, snippet, and content preview. Assigns weighted scores to each component and returns the updated pages.

functions.name: select_within_token_limit
functions.description: Selects web pages whose total token count does not exceed the given limit, truncating the last page if necessary to stay within the limit.

functions.name: format_results_xml
functions.description: Formats a GeneralWebSearchResult object into an XML string with query, token count, and paginated results including title, URL, and content.

functions.name: format_error

functions.name: format_no_results
functions.description: Returns a formatted string indicating no search results were found for the given query.

functions.name: main

Integrates with configuration, file parsing, and orchestration components.

functions.name: print_header
functions.description: Prints a centered header with a border of a specified character, using ANSI colors for styling.

functions.name: print_section

functions.name: print_success
functions.description: Prints a success message with a green checkmark and resets the color formatting.

functions.name: print_error
functions.description: Prints error messages in red with a cross symbol for visual clarity.

functions.name: print_warning

functions.name: print_info

functions.name: print_metric
functions.description: Prints a metric with color-coded output based on an optional threshold, using predefined color constants.

functions.name: extract_sections

functions.name: select_directory
functions.description: Позволяет пользователю выбрать директорию проекта из предложенных вариантов или ввести собственный путь, проверяя существование директории и наличие в ней файла индекса.

functions.name: select_model

functions.name: get_staging_error_guidance

functions.name: create_runtime_test_feedback
functions.description: Constructs a RuntimeTestFeedback object from a summary dictionary, categorizing test results and extracting analysis data for reporting.

functions.name: create_validation_error_feedback
functions.description: Constructs a ValidationErrorFeedback object from a validation result dictionary, filtering issues by level and categorizing them into errors, warnings, and affected files.

functions.name: create_test_run_feedback_from_xml

functions.name: handle_user_validation_action

functions.name: create_feedback_loop
functions.description: Initializes a FeedbackLoopState object with session parameters and limits for validation, orchestration, and testing.

functions.name: get_validator

functions.name: validate_code_change
functions.description: Validates a proposed code change against the original content and user request using a validator, returning structured results and feedback. Integrates with the ValidatorFeedback class for standardized output.

functions.name: is_context_overflow_error
functions.description: Determines if an exception is caused by exceeding the context limit in LLM providers, by checking for common error message patterns.

functions.name: get_compressor
functions.description: Returns a cached or newly created IntraSessionCompressor for a given model ID, ensuring consistent state within a session.

functions.name: reset_compressor
functions.description: Resets the compressor for a given model by removing it from the compressor cache, typically used to start a new session. Integrates with a model-specific caching mechanism.

functions.name: reset_all_compressors
functions.description: Clears the internal compressor cache, effectively resetting all cached compressors. Used for managing state in compressor-related operations.

functions.name: maybe_compress_context
functions.description: Message compression utility for LLM context management, integrates with model-specific compressors via async orchestration.

functions.name: _get_tree_sitter_parser
functions.description: Provides lazy initialization of a Tree-sitter parser for fault-tolerant code parsing, with fallback handling if the parser is unavailable.

functions.name: classify_staging_error
functions.description: Classifies staging error messages into predefined error types based on keyword patterns. Used to provide structured feedback on common staging errors.

functions.name: parse_args
functions.description: Parses command-line arguments for test configuration, including verbosity, skipping slow tests, test filtering, and temp file cleanup control.

functions.name: test_vfs_initialization
functions.description: Tests the initialization of the VirtualFileSystem, verifying root path and initial state of pending changes.

functions.name: test_vfs_staging_new_file
functions.description: Tests staging of a new file in the virtual file system, verifying creation metadata and pending change status. Uses VirtualFileSystem to stage and validate a new Python file.

functions.name: test_vfs_staging_modification
functions.description: Tests the staging of modifications to an existing file in a virtual file system, verifying change type, content comparison, and line differences. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and TestFixture for file operations.

functions.name: test_vfs_staging_deletion
functions.description: Unit test verifying VFS deletion staging behavior, validates change metadata and virtual file existence state.

functions.name: test_vfs_read_staged
functions.description: Tests reading a file with pending changes in a virtual file system, ensuring staged content is returned instead of the original. Uses VirtualFileSystem to read, stage, and verify file content.

functions.name: test_vfs_read_original
functions.description: Tests reading the original content of a file from the Virtual File System without pending changes, ensuring read_file_original returns the unmodified version. Uses file staging to verify original content retrieval.

functions.name: test_vfs_unstage
functions.description: Tests the unstage functionality of a Virtual File System, verifying removal of staged changes and handling of invalid unstages.

functions.name: test_vfs_discard_all
functions.description: Tests discarding all staged changes in a virtual file system, verifying the count and state of pending changes. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for file staging and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_affected_files_dependents
functions.description: Tests identification of dependent files affected by changes in a virtual file system, using staged modifications and import relationships. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for file tracking and analysis.

functions.name: test_vfs_affected_files_dependencies
functions.description: Tests detection of file dependencies in a virtual file system, using staged changes to identify affected and dependent files. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for file tracking and dependency analysis.

functions.name: test_vfs_diff_generation
functions.description: Тестирует генерацию diff-файла в виртуальной файловой системе, проверяя наличие изменений и корректность формата. Использует VirtualFileSystem и утверждения для валидации результата.

functions.name: test_vfs_get_all_diffs
functions.description: Tests retrieving diffs for all staged files in a virtual file system, verifies correct file count and presence.

functions.name: test_vfs_status
functions.description: Tests the status retrieval of a virtual file system by staging changes and verifying the expected status output, including change types and counts. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and file staging logic.

functions.name: test_vfs_format_status_message
functions.description: Tests the formatting of a status message for a virtual file system, using staged changes and asserting expected content in the output.

functions.name: test_vfs_commit_sync
functions.description: Тестирует синхронный коммит изменений в виртуальной файловой системе, проверяя создание, модификацию и сохранение файлов, а также состояние staging-области. Использует VirtualFileSystem и утверждения для проверки результатов.

functions.name: test_vfs_commit_with_backup
functions.description: Tests the commit process with backup functionality using a virtual file system and backup manager, ensuring file modifications are committed, backed up, and restorable. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and BackupManager.

functions.name: test_vfs_multiple_modifications_same_file
functions.description: Tests handling of multiple modifications to the same file in a virtual file system, ensuring that the latest change overwrites previous ones and only one pending change is tracked. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for file staging and reading.

functions.name: test_vfs_empty_file
functions.description: Tests handling of empty files in the Virtual File System, verifies staging, committing, and file creation with empty content. Integrates with TestFixture for file operations and assertions.

functions.name: test_vfs_get_all_python_files
functions.description: Tests the retrieval of all Python files in a virtual file system, verifying the presence of specific files like "auth.py" and "helpers.py". Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and test fixtures for project root setup.

functions.name: test_vfs_find_test_files
functions.description: Tests the ability of the VirtualFileSystem to locate corresponding test files, integrates with the file system and test fixture setup.

functions.name: test_vfs_invalidate_cache
functions.description: Tests the cache invalidation functionality of the VirtualFileSystem, ensuring cached data is properly cleared.

functions.name: test_vfs_pending_changes_property
functions.description: Tests the pending_changes property of the VirtualFileSystem, verifying that staged changes are correctly stored and accessible.

functions.name: test_backup_initialization
functions.description: Tests the initialization of BackupManager, verifying project root and backup directory creation.

functions.name: test_backup_session_lifecycle
functions.description: Tests the full lifecycle of a backup session, including session creation, backup creation, and session termination, using the BackupManager service.

functions.name: test_backup_restore_file
functions.description: Tests the backup and restoration of a single file using the BackupManager, verifies file corruption and successful restoration. Integrates with TestFixture for file manipulation and BackupManager for backup operations.

functions.name: test_backup_restore_session
functions.description: Tests the full session restoration functionality using a BackupManager, including creating backups, corrupting files, and verifying successful restoration. Integrates with file operations via a TestFixture.

functions.name: test_backup_list_sessions
functions.description: Tests listing backup sessions by creating and verifying multiple sessions in reverse order, using the BackupManager service.

functions.name: test_backup_nonexistent_file
functions.description: Tests the backup process for a nonexistent file, ensuring the BackupManager correctly returns None without errors. Uses BackupManager and assertion for validation.

functions.name: test_backup_duplicate_file_in_session
functions.description: Tests handling of duplicate file backups within the same session by attempting to back up the same file twice and ensuring no errors occur. Integrates with BackupManager for session and backup operations.

functions.name: test_backup_empty_session
functions.description: Tests handling of an empty backup session with no backups created, using the BackupManager service. Verifies that ending the session returns a non-None result with an empty backups list.

functions.name: test_modifier_replace_file
functions.description: Tests replacing an entire file's content using the FileModifier, verifies success status and new content.

functions.name: test_modifier_insert_into_class
functions.description: Tests inserting a new method into a Python class using FileModifier, verifying correct placement, indentation, and structure. Integrates with ModifyInstruction and ModifyMode for class modification logic.

functions.name: test_modifier_replace_method
functions.description: Tests replacing a method in a class using the FileModifier, ensuring the new method is applied correctly without affecting other methods. Integrates with ModifyInstruction and ModifyMode for precise code modification.

functions.name: test_modifier_replace_function
functions.description: Tests replacing a specific function in a module-level code string using FileModifier, ensuring the replacement preserves other functions and updates the target function's content.

functions.name: test_modifier_replace_class
functions.description: Tests replacing a class in source code using FileModifier, verifies content preservation and replacement accuracy.

functions.name: test_modifier_insert_import
functions.description: Tests inserting an import statement into a Python file using FileModifier, ensuring the import is added correctly and not duplicated.

functions.name: test_modifier_append_to_file
functions.description: Tests appending code to the end of a file using FileModifier, verifies content order and success status.

functions.name: test_modifier_smart_apply
functions.description: Tests the smart application of code modifications by adding a method to an existing class using FileModifier, ensuring correct integration and syntax.

functions.name: test_modifier_class_not_found
functions.description: Tests error handling when a non-existent class is referenced in a modification instruction, using the FileModifier service to verify failure messages.

functions.name: test_modifier_syntax_error_handling
functions.description: Tests handling of syntax errors in code modification, uses FileModifier to apply changes and verifies error detection.

functions.name: test_modifier_indent_detection
functions.description: Tests the detection of indentation style (spaces or tabs) in code using the FileModifier class. Verifies correct identification of 2-space and tab-based indentation.

functions.name: test_modifier_apply_to_vfs
functions.description: Tests integration between FileModifier and VirtualFileSystem by applying code modifications to a virtual file, verifying success status, pending changes, and content insertion. Uses VFS for file operations and assertions.

functions.name: test_modifier_preserve_trailing_newline
functions.description: Tests that a trailing newline is preserved after applying a file modification, using the FileModifier service to replace content.

functions.name: test_modifier_method_with_decorators
functions.description: Tests replacing a method with decorators in a Python class using the FileModifier, ensuring other methods and structure remain intact.

functions.name: test_modifier_nested_class
functions.description: Tests adding a method to an outer class while preserving its nested class structure using the FileModifier, ensuring code insertion maintains existing inner classes.

functions.name: test_modifier_mode_mapping
functions.description: Tests the MODE_MAPPING dictionary in FileModifier for correct key presence and value assignments, ensuring proper mapping of modification modes.

functions.name: test_modifier_parsed_code_block
functions.description: Tests the ParsedCodeBlock and apply_code_block functionality by inserting a method into a class, verifying the modification was successful and logged correctly. Uses FileModifier and assertion checks for validation.

functions.name: test_modifier_apply_code_block_to_vfs
functions.description: Tests the apply_code_block_to_vfs method by applying a code block to a virtual file system and verifying the changes. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and FileModifier to simulate code insertion into a file.

functions.name: test_modifier_invalid_mode
functions.description: Tests handling of an unknown MODE in FileModifier, verifies failure response and error message.

functions.name: test_large_file_handling
functions.description: Tests handling of large files (1MB+) using a virtual file system, measuring staging and commit performance. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for file operations and TestFixture for environment setup.

functions.name: test_unicode_content
functions.description: Тестирует обработку Unicode-содержимого в виртуальной файловой системе, включая сохранение, коммит и чтение файлов с кириллицей, иероглифами, эмодзи и другими символами. Использует VirtualFileSystem и утверждения для проверки корректности содержимого.

functions.name: test_unicode_file_path
functions.description: Tests handling of Unicode file paths in a virtual file system, including directory creation, file staging, and content verification. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and test fixtures for file operations.

functions.name: test_concurrent_staging
functions.description: Tests concurrent file staging using a thread pool, integrates with VirtualFileSystem to verify atomic commits and error handling.

functions.name: test_readonly_file_handling
functions.description: Tests handling of read-only files in a virtual file system, integrates with VirtualFileSystem and TestFixture for file permission manipulation and validation. Skips execution on Windows due to different file permission models.

functions.name: test_deeply_nested_path
functions.description: Tests the handling of deeply nested file paths in a virtual file system, using staged changes and commit operations to verify file creation and existence. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and test fixtures for file system validation.

functions.name: test_special_characters_in_content
functions.description: Tests handling of special characters in file content using a virtual file system, ensuring proper preservation of escape sequences and formatting in committed files. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for staging and committing changes.

functions.name: test_empty_directory_structure
functions.description: Tests the creation of a file in a non-existent directory structure using the VirtualFileSystem, ensuring directories are created and the file is saved correctly.

functions.name: test_binary_like_content
functions.description: Tests handling of binary-like content in a virtual file system, verifies file staging, committing, and content integrity. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and file-reading utilities.

functions.name: test_full_workflow
functions.description: Tests the full workflow of file modification, versioning, backup, and restoration using VirtualFileSystem, BackupManager, and FileModifier. Integrates with test fixtures for file validation and rollback verification.

functions.name: test_multiple_files_workflow
functions.description: Tests a workflow for modifying multiple files using VirtualFileSystem and BackupManager, applying code changes to classes and verifying the modifications and commit process. Integrates with FileModifier for code insertion and assertion checks.

functions.name: test_rollback_on_partial_failure
functions.description: Тестирует откат изменений в виртуальной файловой системе при частичной ошибке, используя бэкап-менеджер для восстановления предыдущего состояния. Интегрирует VirtualFileSystem и BackupManager.

functions.name: test_chain_modifications
functions.description: Tests applying a chain of file modifications to a single file using VirtualFileSystem and FileModifier, verifying insertion of methods and imports. Integrates with TestFixture for file handling and assertions.

functions.name: test_vfs_with_change_type_enum
functions.description: Tests the usage of the ChangeType enum in VirtualFileSystem for staging file changes, ensuring correct assignment of CREATE and MODIFY types.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs a comprehensive test suite for agent foundation components including VirtualFileSystem, BackupManager, and FileModifier, using asyncio with test setup/teardown and logging.

functions.name: parse_args
functions.description: Parses command-line arguments for test configuration, including verbosity, skipping slow tests, test filtering, and temp file cleanup control.

functions.name: run_test
functions.description: Runs a single test with error handling and filtering, supports both async and sync test functions. Integrates with command-line arguments for test filtering and skipping slow tests.

functions.name: test_vfs_initialization
functions.description: Unit test for VirtualFileSystem initialization, validates root path and empty state with fixture lifecycle management.

functions.name: test_vfs_read_file
functions.description: Tests the file reading functionality of the VirtualFileSystem class, including reading existing and non-existing files, checking file existence, and using a safe read method with a default value. Uses a test fixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_stage_modify
functions.description: Unit test for VirtualFileSystem's staging of file modifications, validating change metadata and content persistence.

functions.name: test_vfs_stage_create
functions.description: Tests staging a new file in the Virtual File System, verifying creation flags and in-memory existence without affecting the actual disk. Integrates with TestFixture for environment setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_stage_delete
functions.description: Tests the staging of a file deletion in a virtual file system, verifying the change type, existence in VFS, and actual file presence on disk. Uses a test fixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_stage_with_change_type
functions.description: Tests staging functionality in VirtualFileSystem with explicit ChangeType (CREATE/MODIFY), integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_affected_files
functions.description: Tests the detection of affected files in a virtual file system, including staging changes, retrieving affected files, and validating their categorization and serialization.

functions.name: test_vfs_find_tests
functions.description: Tests the ability of the VirtualFileSystem to locate corresponding test files for a given module, specifically checking for "tests/test_models.py" when provided with "app/models.py". Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_unstage
functions.description: Tests the unstaging functionality of a Virtual File System, including unstaging individual files and discarding all staged changes. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and uses a test fixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_diff
functions.description: Tests the generation of diffs in a virtual file system, including staging changes and retrieving both individual and all staged diffs. Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_status
functions.description: Tests the VirtualFileSystem status functionality by staging changes and verifying the returned status and formatted message. Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_commit
functions.description: Tests the commit functionality of the VirtualFileSystem, verifying file staging, committing, and disk synchronization. Integrates with TestFixture for environment setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_commit_delete
functions.description: Tests the deletion commit functionality of a Virtual File System, ensuring staged files are properly deleted and tracked in the commit result. Integrates with TestFixture for environment setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_unicode_content
functions.description: Tests handling of Unicode content in a virtual file system, including staging, reading, committing, and verifying files with Russian, Japanese, emoji, and special characters. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_unicode_path
functions.description: Тестирует работу виртуальной файловой системы с Unicode-путями, включая создание, чтение и коммит файлов на диске. Использует TestFixture для подготовки и очистки окружения.

functions.name: test_vfs_all_python_files
functions.description: Tests the retrieval of all Python files using the VirtualFileSystem, verifying presence of expected files like models.py and user_service.py. Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_vfs_cache_invalidation
functions.description: Tests the cache invalidation functionality of the VirtualFileSystem, ensuring cached data is properly reset after invalidation.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_valid
functions.description: Tests valid Python syntax using the SyntaxChecker class, ensuring no critical issues or auto-fixes are needed for properly formatted code.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_syntax_error
functions.description: Tests the detection of syntax errors in Python code using the SyntaxChecker, verifies invalid status, critical issues, and presence of syntax-related errors.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_indent_error
functions.description: Tests detection of Python indentation errors using the SyntaxChecker service, validating that invalid files are correctly flagged.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_tab_space_mix
functions.description: Tests detection of mixed tabs and spaces in Python code using SyntaxChecker, integrates with test files and TestResult for reporting.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_auto_fix
functions.description: Tests the auto-fix functionality of the SyntaxChecker, ensuring it converts tab characters to spaces in Python code.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_json
functions.description: Tests the JSON validation functionality of the SyntaxChecker class, verifying valid, invalid, and empty JSON cases.

functions.name: test_syntax_checker_unicode
functions.description: Tests the syntax checker's handling of Unicode Python code by validating a predefined Unicode code sample. Uses the SyntaxChecker class and returns a TestResult indicating success or failure.

functions.name: test_validator_syntax_level
functions.description: Tests syntax-level validation of staged code changes using a virtual file system and ChangeValidator, returning a TestResult with validation outcome and metrics. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and ValidationLevel.

functions.name: test_validator_syntax_error
functions.description: Tests detection of syntax errors by the ChangeValidator during code validation, integrates with VirtualFileSystem for staged file changes.

functions.name: test_validator_imports_level
functions.description: Tests import validation level by staging a file and checking if syntax and import validations pass using the ChangeValidator. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_validator_import_error
functions.description: Тестирует обнаружение ошибок импорта в изменённых файлах с помощью ChangeValidator, проверяя наличие ошибок после стейджа с неверными импортами. Использует VirtualFileSystem и асинхронную валидацию.

functions.name: test_validator_types_level
functions.description: Tests type validation (using mypy) for staged code changes in a virtual file system. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and ChangeValidator.

functions.name: test_validator_integration_level
functions.description: Tests integration-level validation of file changes using a virtual file system and ChangeValidator, checking syntax and integration issues. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and ValidationLevel enums.

functions.name: test_validator_new_files
functions.description: Tests validation of newly staged files in a virtual file system, checking detection and validation results for syntax, imports, and integration. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and ChangeValidator.

functions.name: test_validator_quick_methods
functions.description: Tests the quick validation methods (syntax-only and syntax + imports) of the ChangeValidator, using a VirtualFileSystem to stage and validate code changes. Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup, and returns a structured TestResult.

functions.name: test_validator_test_discovery
functions.description: Тестирует обнаружение тестовых файлов валидатором изменений в виртуальной файловой системе, проверяя заполнение списка найденных тестов без их запуска. Использует VirtualFileSystem и ChangeValidator.

functions.name: test_validator_result_summary
functions.description: Tests the summary and serialization methods of ValidationResult by validating staged file changes with a syntax check, using VirtualFileSystem and ChangeValidator.

functions.name: test_full_workflow
functions.description: Tests the full workflow of staging, validating, and committing file changes using a virtual file system, integrating with ChangeValidator for syntax and import checks.

functions.name: test_workflow_with_backup
functions.description: Tests a file modification workflow with backup and restore functionality using VirtualFileSystem and BackupManager. Validates changes, backups, and restoration of file content.

functions.name: test_concurrent_staging
functions.description: Tests concurrent file staging using a thread pool, verifies no errors occur and all staged files are committed successfully. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for file operations.

functions.name: test_large_file
functions.description: Tests handling of large files by generating a ~500KB Python file, checking syntax, staging, and committing it using VirtualFileSystem and SyntaxChecker. Measures performance metrics for each step.

functions.name: test_performance
functions.description: Measures the performance of virtual file system operations and validation stages, including initialization, staging changes, syntax checks, and validation, ensuring total execution stays under 30 seconds. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem, SyntaxChecker, and ChangeValidator.

functions.name: run_all_tests
functions.description: Runs integration tests for an agent system, including virtual file system, syntax checking, change validation, and workflow integration tests, with support for skipping slow tests and filtering.

functions.name: setup_logging
functions.description: Configures colored console logging with customizable verbosity, using ANSI escape codes for different log levels.

functions.name: test_imports
functions.description: Verifies that all required modules and components are importable for the code generation and validation system, including file handling, virtual file system, agents, and prompt templates.

functions.name: test_mode_mapping
functions.description: Tests the MODE_MAPPING attribute in FileModifier to ensure all required modification modes are present and correctly mapped to ModifyMode instances.

functions.name: test_parse_code_blocks_single
functions.description: Tests the parsing of a single CODE_BLOCK from a mock response, verifying correct extraction of file path, mode, class, method, and code content.

functions.name: test_parse_code_blocks_multiple
functions.description: Tests the parsing of multiple code blocks from a generator response, verifying correct count, modes, and insertion context. Integrates with parse_agent_code_blocks from the code generator module.

functions.name: test_apply_code_block_replace_method
functions.description: Unit test for method replacement functionality in a file modifier service, validating signature updates and content preservation.

functions.name: test_apply_code_block_insert_class
functions.description: Tests inserting a method into a class using a CODE_BLOCK, verifying correct placement and content in the modified file. Integrates with FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock.

functions.name: test_apply_code_block_insert_import
functions.description: Tests the insertion of an import statement into a Python file using the FileModifier, ensuring the import is correctly added and positioned before the class definition.

functions.name: test_apply_code_block_replace_file
functions.description: Tests creating a new file by applying a CODE_BLOCK with REPLACE_FILE mode, verifying the generated content includes expected functions. Integrates with FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock.

functions.name: test_vfs_integration
functions.description: Тестирует интеграцию FileModifier с VirtualFileSystem, проверяя применение изменений к виртуальному файлу без модификации реального файла. Использует ParsedCodeBlock для замены метода в виртуальной файловой системе и проверяет статус изменений, содержимое и изоляцию от реальной файловой системы.

functions.name: test_prompt_templates_agent_mode
functions.description: Tests the configuration and formatting of prompt templates for Agent Mode, ensuring system/user prompts are correctly structured and contain required elements.

functions.name: test_prompt_templates_validator
functions.description: Validates AI Validator prompt templates by checking for required keywords, non-empty system prompts, and correct formatting output structure. Integrates with format_ai_validator_prompt and AI_VALIDATOR_SYSTEM_PROMPT from the LLM module.

functions.name: test_full_parsing_and_apply_cycle
functions.description: Tests the full cycle of parsing code blocks, applying them to a virtual file system, and verifying the results, integrating with VirtualFileSystem, FileModifier, and code parsing logic.

functions.name: test_ai_validator_basic
functions.description: Tests the basic structure and method functionality of AIValidator, including validation of the _parse_response method's output.

functions.name: test_ai_validator_with_api
functions.description: Тестирует AI Validator через реальный API вызов, проверяя валидацию предложенного кода для метода проверки email. Интегрируется с классом AIValidator и возвращает структурированный результат теста.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Conducts a comprehensive test suite for Agent Mode code generation functionality, including imports, configuration, code block parsing and application, VFS integration, prompt validation, and full workflow cycles. Integrates with a TestRunner for logging and directory management.

functions.name: count_tokens
functions.description: Counts the number of tokens in a given text string using a predefined token counter.

functions.name: count_messages_tokens
functions.description: Counts the number of tokens in message content, supporting both string and list-based content formats.

functions.name: get_test_compressor
functions.description: Returns a configured TestCompressor or default IntraSessionCompressor based on model-specific test limits.

functions.name: create_tool_result
functions.description: Generates a tool result string containing Python code with iteration-specific classes, functions, and constants, simulating a module's structure and logic for testing or demonstration purposes.

functions.name: log_messages_summary
functions.description: Logs token counts and role distribution for message lists, returning total tokens for integration with token-aware processing systems.

functions.name: extract_assistant_fields
functions.description: Extracts and formats assistant response fields for LLM API compatibility, handling optional content, tool calls, and reasoning metadata.

functions.name: build_real_context
functions.description: Constructs a conversational context by making real API calls to a language model, integrating with tools to simulate analysis of code modules. It dynamically builds and extends the message history until a target token size or iteration limit is reached.

functions.name: test_no_proactive_compression
functions.description: Tests that a specified model (e.g., GPT-5.1) does not perform proactive context compression, even with a large context, by building real API calls and verifying message integrity and API response success. Integrates with logging, compression logic, and LLM API tools.

functions.name: test_proactive_compression
functions.description: Tests proactive context compression for specific models using real API calls, verifies compression effectiveness, and ensures API functionality is preserved after compression. Integrates with logging, context building, compression utilities, and LLM API calls.

functions.name: test_emergency_compression
functions.description: Tests emergency context compression for a specified model by building a large context, compressing it, and verifying API functionality with the compressed data. Uses logging and integrates with LLM tools for validation.

functions.name: run_all_tests
functions.description: Runs a test suite for context compression functionality with real API calls, testing different models (GPT-5.1 Codex Max, DeepSeek, Gemini) for proactive and emergency compression behavior.

functions.name: get_thread_history
functions.description: Retrieves the entire message history for a given thread using the history manager's storage, with error logging.

functions.name: get_thread_history_with_pagination
functions.description: Retrieves paginated message history for a given thread, calculating total pages and adjusting the page number if out of bounds. Integrates with HistoryManager and logging for error handling.

functions.name: display_history_page
functions.description: Отображает страницу истории диалога с навигацией и командами, форматируя сообщения и их метаданные. Использует ChatViewer для форматирования и поддерживает постраничный вывод.

functions.name: interactive_history_viewer
functions.description: Позволяет интерактивно просматривать историю чата с поддержкой пагинации, поиска, экспорта и отображения статистики, используя HistoryManager и ChatViewer.

functions.name: search_in_history
functions.description: Выполняет поиск заданного термина в истории диалога по указанному thread_id, выводит результаты с контекстом и подсветкой совпадений. Интегрируется с HistoryManager и ChatViewer для получения и отображения сообщений.

functions.name: export_thread_history
functions.description: Exports a chat thread's history to a Markdown file, including message content, metadata, and thread statistics. Integrates with HistoryManager and uses asyncio for asynchronous file operations.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Тестирует общую систему чата с поддержкой истории, позволяет создавать, продолжать и просматривать диалоги, интегрируется с HistoryManager и GeneralChatOrchestrator.

functions.name: handle_exit_command
functions.description: Сохраняет данные диалога при выходе, используя либо постоянное хранилище, либо временный JSON-файл. Интегрируется с history_manager для управления потоками и сохраняет метрики диалога.

functions.name: handle_history_command
functions.description: Displays chat history either from persistent storage or a temporary list, formatting messages for readability. Integrates with ChatViewer for message rendering.

functions.name: handle_stats_command
functions.description: Retrieves and displays chat statistics for a specific thread using the history manager and ChatViewer, if the thread exists.

functions.name: handle_clear_command
functions.description: Очищает историю сообщений для указанного потока или временной истории, в зависимости от настроек, с подтверждением при использовании постоянного хранилища.

functions.name: handle_model_command
functions.description: Displays available models and shows the current model, with a note that real-time model switching is not supported.

functions.name: run_database_tests
functions.description: Runs a series of database tests for a history manager, including thread creation, message addition, database verification, history retrieval, and export functionality. Integrates with SQLite for data validation.

functions.name: init_advice_system
functions.description: Initializes and returns a global AdviceSystem instance, loading advice data from a specified base path.

functions.name: get_advice_system
functions.description: Provides a global instance of the AdviceSystem, initializing it if it doesn't already exist.

functions.name: get_catalog_for_prompt
functions.description: Generates a formatted catalog of advice entries for inclusion in the Orchestrator's system prompt, grouped by category and filtered by mode (ask or new_project). Integrates with the advice system to retrieve and display advice summaries.

functions.name: execute_get_advice
functions.description: Executes the get_advice tool with support for searching by ID, name, or keyword, returning XML-formatted advice content or error messages; integrates with an advice system for query resolution and suggestions.

functions.name: test_advice_directory_exists
functions.description: Verifies the existence and validity of the "app/advice" directory within the project structure.

functions.name: test_advice_catalog_file_exists
functions.description: Verifies the existence of the advice_catalog.json file in the specified project directory.

functions.name: test_advice_content_file_exists
functions.description: Verifies the existence of the advice_content.json file in the specified project directory. Used to ensure the advice system has access to its required data file.

functions.name: test_advice_loader_file_exists
functions.description: Verifies the existence of the advice_loader.py file within the specified project directory structure.

functions.name: test_advice_init_file_exists
functions.description: Verifies the existence of the __init__.py file in the app/advice directory to ensure the module is properly initialized.

functions.name: test_catalog_json_valid
functions.description: Validates the structure and content of the advice_catalog.json file, ensuring required fields exist and data types are correct.

functions.name: test_content_json_valid
functions.description: Validates the structure and content of the advice_content.json file, ensuring required fields exist and are of the correct type.

functions.name: test_catalog_content_consistency
functions.description: Verifies that all advice IDs in the catalog have matching entries in the content file and logs warnings for unused content entries. Integrates with JSON files for catalog and content data.

functions.name: test_import_advice_loader
functions.description: Verifies the correct import and presence of key components in the advice_loader module, ensuring the AdviceSystem and related functions are available.

functions.name: test_import_advice_init
functions.description: Tests the import and availability of core components from the app.advice module, ensuring classes and functions are properly initialized and callable.

functions.name: test_import_tool_definitions
functions.description: Verifies that the get_advice tool is correctly defined and included in the orchestrator's tool list.

functions.name: test_import_tool_executor
functions.description: Tests the ToolExecutor's ability to handle the get_advice command, including validation of method existence and error handling for invalid advice IDs.

functions.name: test_advice_system_initialization
functions.description: Tests the correct initialization of the AdviceSystem, verifying availability, loaded advices, and categories, with logging of results. Integrates with logging and the AdviceSystem class.

functions.name: test_get_catalog_for_prompt_ask_mode
functions.description: Tests the generation of a catalog for the 'ask' mode by verifying its content, structure, and inclusion of specific advice codes, using assertions and logging. Integrates with get_catalog_for_prompt from the advice loader.

functions.name: test_get_catalog_for_prompt_new_project_mode
functions.description: Tests the catalog generation for the 'new_project' mode by verifying its content includes relevant advices and excludes advices meant for existing projects. Integrates with get_catalog_for_prompt from the advice loader.

functions.name: test_get_single_advice
functions.description: Tests retrieval and content of a specific advice (ADV-G01) from the advice system, validating its structure and content using assertions and logging.

functions.name: test_get_multiple_advices
functions.description: Tests the retrieval of multiple advices from the advice system, verifying correct handling of valid and invalid IDs. Integrates with the get_advice_system and logging modules.

functions.name: test_execute_get_advice_tool
functions.description: Tests the execute_get_advice function for correct handling of single and multiple advice requests, invalid IDs, and empty input, ensuring proper XML formatting and error responses. Integrates with the advice_loader module.

functions.name: test_prompt_template_has_placeholder
functions.description: Verifies that specified prompt templates contain the {advice_catalog} placeholder, ensuring compatibility with the advice catalog integration.

functions.name: test_prompt_template_has_methodology
functions.description: Tests that orchestrator prompt templates contain required methodology markers for the advice system. Checks for presence of keywords like "ADVICE SYSTEM", "get_advice", and classification codes in system prompts.

functions.name: test_format_prompt_ask_agent
functions.description: Tests the format_orchestrator_prompt_ask_agent function ensures the catalog and methodology are included in the system prompt, and verifies placeholder replacement. Integrates with logging and assertion checks for validation.

functions.name: test_format_prompt_new_project_agent
functions.description: Tests the formatting of a new project agent prompt to ensure it includes the correct advice catalog and excludes existing project advice. Integrates with logging and assertion checks for validation.

functions.name: test_tool_executor_get_advice_e2e
functions.description: Performs an end-to-end test of the get_advice tool execution via ToolExecutor, verifying the response structure and content for a specific advice ID. Integrates with logging and assertion checks for validation.

functions.name: test_all_advices_have_required_sections
functions.description: Verifies that all advice entries have the required sections (Phase/Step and Goal/Purpose), logs missing sections as warnings, and asserts that the majority of advices follow the expected structure. Integrates with the advice_loader module.

functions.name: test_advice_content_not_too_long
functions.description: Tests that advice content does not exceed a character limit, logging warnings for any advice that is too long. Integrates with the advice_loader module to retrieve advice content.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs an integration test suite for an advice system, verifying file existence, JSON validity, module imports, functionality, prompt templates, and end-to-end execution.

functions.name: test_json_files_exist_and_valid
functions.description: Validates the existence and structure of JSON files used by an advice system, ensuring catalog and content files are correctly formatted and consistent with each other. Integrates with file system and JSON parsing.

functions.name: test_advice_system_initialization
functions.description: Tests the initialization of the AdviceSystem, verifying catalog and category loading, presence of required advice items, and correct lazy loading behavior.

functions.name: test_lazy_loading_content
functions.description: Tests lazy loading of content in the AdviceSystem, verifying content is loaded only when needed and cached for subsequent calls.

functions.name: test_get_advice_content
functions.description: Tests the get_advice function for correct content retrieval, structure validation, and error handling of invalid inputs. Integrates with the advice_loader module and assertion checks.

functions.name: test_catalog_for_prompt_ask_mode
functions.description: Tests the generation of an advice catalog for 'ask' mode, verifying content length, headers, advice IDs, descriptions, and readability. Integrates with get_catalog_for_prompt from advice_loader.

functions.name: test_catalog_for_prompt_new_project_mode
functions.description: Tests the generation of an advice catalog for the 'new_project' mode, validating content length, presence of required elements, and structure. Integrates with get_catalog_for_prompt from advice_loader.

functions.name: test_mode_filtering
functions.description: Tests that the advice system correctly filters categories based on mode (ask vs. new_project), ensuring advices appear only in the appropriate catalogs. Integrates with get_advice_system and get_catalog_for_prompt from the advice module.

functions.name: test_execute_get_advice_tool
functions.description: Tests the execute_get_advice function for correct handling of valid and invalid inputs, including single and multiple advice requests, empty input, and whitespace. Integrates with the advice_loader module.

functions.name: test_singleton_pattern
functions.description: Tests the singleton pattern implementation of the advice system to ensure get_advice_system always returns the same instance. Uses module-level instance reset and assertion checks for verification.

functions.name: test_prompt_template_integration
functions.description: Tests integration with prompt templates for LLM orchestration, verifying correct formatting and inclusion of the advice catalog in system prompts for both "ask" and "new project" scenarios.

functions.name: test_error_handling
functions.description: Tests error handling in the advice system, focusing on malicious input, long input, and Unicode characters in advice IDs.

functions.name: test_catalog_content_quality
functions.description: Tests the quality of catalog content in the advice system by validating ID format, name and description lengths, and category validity. Integrates with advice_loader and the system's catalog and categories.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs a comprehensive suite of integration tests for an advice system, validating JSON files, initialization, lazy loading, advice retrieval, catalog functionality, mode filtering, error handling, and design patterns.

functions.name: run_project_tests
functions.description: Runs project unit tests in an isolated environment using a virtual or real filesystem, supports test chunking, and returns results in XML format. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem for staged testing and executes tests via subprocess with project-specific Python interpreters.

functions.name: _create_test_environment
functions.description: Creates an isolated test environment by copying project files into a temporary directory, optionally overlaying staged changes from a VirtualFileSystem; integrates with file copying utilities and cleanup via a context manager.

functions.name: _copy_from_vfs
functions.description: Copies files from a VirtualFileSystem to a temporary directory, applying staged changes and handling deletions, integrating with VFS methods for overlay logic.

functions.name: _scan_python_files
functions.description: Recursively scans a project directory for Python files while excluding specified directories, returning a set of normalized relative file paths.

functions.name: _should_skip_path
functions.description: Determines whether a given relative file path should be skipped based on hidden files, exact directory matches, or wildcard patterns in SKIP_DIRS.

functions.name: _copy_project_files
functions.description: Copies all Python files from a project directory to a temporary directory for testing when VirtualFileSystem is unavailable, skipping excluded paths and logging the number of files copied.

functions.name: _path_to_module
functions.description: Converts a file path to a Python module path by replacing separators with dots and removing the .py extension, used for unittest discovery.

functions.name: _execute_unittest
functions.description: Executes Python unittests in a subprocess within a temporary directory, with timeout handling, output capture, and environment configuration for isolated test runs. Integrates with subprocess, logging, and a custom TestResult parser.

functions.name: _parse_unittest_output
functions.description: Parses the verbose output of Python unittest into a structured TestResult object, extracting test counts, failures, errors, and system-level issues like import or syntax errors.

functions.name: _extract_failed_tests
functions.description: Parses unittest output to extract failed or errored tests, returning a structured list with test names and truncated tracebacks. Uses regex to handle different output formats across Python versions.

functions.name: _format_result_xml
functions.description: Formats test results into an XML string for Orchestrator integration, including test status, failures, errors, and execution details.

functions.name: _format_error
functions.description: Formats system-level errors as XML for test output, used for issues occurring before test execution.

functions.name: _escape_xml
functions.description: Escapes special XML characters in a string to make it safe for XML content. Replaces &, <, >, ", and ' with their corresponding XML entity references.

functions.name: parse_test_result_xml
functions.description: Parses XML test results into a TestResult object, used by feedback systems to process test outcomes. Integrates with test execution workflows and error handling.

functions.name: format_test_limit_error
functions.description: Formats an XML error message when the maximum number of test runs per session is exceeded, guiding the agent to use existing results and focus on fixing issues.

functions.name: get_test_runs_remaining
functions.description: Calculates the number of remaining test runs allowed in a session based on a predefined maximum and current usage.

functions.name: can_run_more_tests
functions.description: Determines whether additional test runs can be executed based on a predefined session limit.

functions.name: _load_compact_index_md
functions.description: Loads the compact project index (compact_index.md) for the Orchestrator, returning its content or a fallback message if the file is missing or unreadable.

functions.name: extract_deletions_from_instruction
functions.description: Extracts DELETE instructions for code elements or files from an Orchestrator instruction text, returning a cleaned instruction and a list of PendingDeletion objects. Uses regex to parse two deletion formats and supports METHOD, FUNCTION, CLASS, and FILE types.

functions.name: parse_response_type
functions.description: Analyzes an Orchestrator response to determine if it's a "DIRECT_ANSWER" or "CODE_INSTRUCTION", using multiple regex-based checks for markers, code blocks, and language patterns. Integrates with logging for debugging.

functions.name: _count_skipped_reasons
functions.description: Counts reasons for skipped runtime tests and categorizes them into simplified labels.

functions.name: download_russia_cert
functions.description: Автоматически загружает сертификат Минцифры по указанному URL, если он отсутствует или повреждён, использует requests для скачивания и сохраняет его в указанную директорию.

functions.name: test_openai_compatible
functions.description: Tests OpenAI-compatible models (DeepSeek, OpenRouter, RouterAI) by sending a philosophical question, returns formatted results with status, latency, and response. Uses requests and logging, integrates with external APIs.

functions.name: test_gigachat_full
functions.description: Тестирует авторизацию и работу GigaChat API, включая получение токена и отправку сообщения, с проверкой SSL-сертификата. Использует requests, логирование и настройки из конфигурации.

functions.name: run_checks
functions.description: Runs a connectivity diagnostic for multiple AI models, testing API responses and logging errors; integrates with OpenRouter, DeepSeek, and GigaChat via configured API keys and endpoints.

functions.name: create_project_structure
functions.description: Generates a realistic project directory structure with sample modules and test files for testing purposes, using predefined code templates.

functions.name: test_1_basic_passing_tests
functions.description: Tests a scenario where all 8 tests in test_passing.py are expected to pass, verifying test execution, XML result parsing, and correct result reporting. Integrates with TestRunner, run_project_tests, and parse_test_result_xml.

functions.name: test_2_failing_tests
functions.description: Tests detection of failing and error-prone tests by running a predefined test file and validating XML output for expected failures and errors. Integrates with TestRunner, run_project_tests, and XML parsing.

functions.name: test_3_specific_test_class
functions.description: Tests running a specific test class using chunk_name filtering, verifies test execution and results parsing. Integrates with TestRunner, run_project_tests, and XML result validation.

functions.name: test_4_specific_test_method
functions.description: Tests the execution of a specific test method in a test file, verifying that only one test runs and passes. Integrates with a test runner, project setup, and XML result parsing.

functions.name: test_5_vfs_staged_changes
functions.description: Tests VirtualFileSystem staged changes by verifying original code passes tests and modified (broken) code fails, ensuring VFS overlay functionality. Integrates with test execution, VirtualFileSystem, and result parsing.

functions.name: test_6_vfs_new_file
functions.description: Tests the ability to run project tests on new files staged in a Virtual File System (VFS) without writing them to disk, using VirtualFileSystem and test execution tools.

functions.name: test_7_vfs_deleted_file
functions.description: Tests the behavior of a project when a file is marked as deleted in the Virtual File System (VFS), ensuring test failures occur due to the missing file. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem and test execution utilities.

functions.name: test_8_timeout_handling
functions.description: Tests timeout handling by running a slow test with a 2-second timeout and verifying that the system correctly detects and reports the timeout. Integrates with run_project_tests and test result parsing.

functions.name: test_9_import_error_handling
functions.description: Tests how the system handles import errors during test execution, ensuring errors like ModuleNotFoundError are properly reported. Integrates with test runners and XML result parsing.

functions.name: test_10_nonexistent_test_file
functions.description: Tests error handling when a non-existent test file is provided, verifying that the system returns an error status and handles the situation gracefully.

functions.name: test_11_feedback_handler_integration
functions.description: Tests the integration between FeedbackHandler and TestRunFeedback by running failing tests, generating feedback, and verifying handling and formatting. Integrates with test execution, XML parsing, and feedback orchestration.

functions.name: test_12_feedback_loop_integration
functions.description: Tests the integration of FeedbackLoopState with test runs, including state tracking, run limits, and feedback recording.

functions.name: test_13_tool_executor_integration
functions.description: Tests the integration of ToolExecutor with VirtualFileSystem, ensuring tools like run_project_tests execute correctly and respond to staged file changes.

functions.name: test_14_orchestrator_tool_usage_stats
functions.description: Tests the ToolUsageStats class in the orchestrator, verifying test run tracking, quota enforcement, and independence of web search functionality.

functions.name: test_15_xml_parsing_edge_cases
functions.description: Tests edge cases for XML parsing in test results, ensuring robust handling of empty, invalid, and incomplete XML inputs. Integrates with parse_test_result_xml and TestRunner for validation and reporting.

functions.name: test_16_vfs_multiple_changes
functions.description: Tests the Virtual File System (VFS) handling of multiple simultaneous file changes by staging and running tests on newly added files, ensuring correct test execution and results parsing. Integrates with VirtualFileSystem, run_project_tests, and test assertion utilities.

functions.name: test_17_empty_test_file
functions.description: Tests handling of a Python test file that contains no actual test methods, ensuring the test runner correctly reports 0 tests as a success. Integrates with run_project_tests and parse_test_result_xml for execution and result validation.

functions.name: test_18_syntax_error_in_test
functions.description: Tests handling of a syntax error in a test file by verifying that the test runner detects and reports the error correctly. Integrates with run_project_tests and test result parsing.

functions.name: test_19_fixture_setup_failure
functions.description: Tests handling of test setup failures by verifying that test errors occur when setUp raises an exception, ensuring proper test result reporting. Integrates with test runners and XML result parsing.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs a comprehensive test suite with real execution of tests, virtual file system operations, error handling, and integration checks, using a TestRunner and outputting results with rich console formatting.

functions.name: build_dynamic_import_mapping
functions.description: Constructs a mapping from Python import names to their corresponding pip package names by combining installed package data with fallback mappings for uninstalled packages. Uses importlib.metadata.packages_distributions() and integrates with logging for error and debug tracking.

functions.name: get_import_to_package_mapping
functions.description: Returns a cached mapping of Python import names to their corresponding pip package names, rebuilding it if needed or forced by the refresh flag.

functions.name: list_installed_packages_tool
functions.description: Lists installed Python packages in a project directory, using a specified Python executable if provided; returns the result in XML format. Integrates with subprocess for pip commands and DependencyManager for fallback package listing.

functions.name: install_dependency_tool
functions.description: Installs a Python package dependency in a project directory using a DependencyManager, supporting custom Python/pip paths and version specifiers, and returns the result in XML format.

functions.name: search_pypi_tool
functions.description: Поиск пакета на PyPI по запросу и возврат информации в XML-формате, использует JSON API PyPI и обрабатывает ошибки, такие как отсутствие пакета.

functions.name: _search_pypi_suggestions
functions.description: Searches for similar Python packages on PyPI based on a query, using predefined mappings and variations; returns formatted XML-like suggestions for installation.

functions.name: is_mostly_russian
functions.description: Determines if a given text is predominantly in Russian based on the proportion of Cyrillic characters, using a customizable threshold. Integrates with regular expressions for character detection.

functions.name: _contains_only_code
functions.description: Определяет, состоит ли текст в основном из кода, на основе синтаксических признаков и форматирования; использует регулярные выражения и анализ строк.

functions.name: translate_to_russian
functions.description: Переводит текст на русский с помощью модели Gemini 2.0 Flash, сохраняя технические термины и код, интегрируется с LLM API для асинхронного перевода.

functions.name: _translate_long_text
functions.description: Переводит длинный текст на русский язык по частям, разбивая его на абзацы и строки для соблюдения максимальной длины. Использует асинхронную функцию translate_to_russian для перевода каждой части.

functions.name: translate_sync
