functions.description: Provides a synchronous translation wrapper for use in non-async contexts, using asyncio and threading to run async translation logic; includes checks for Russian text, code, and disables translation when needed.

functions.name: translate_cached
functions.description: Provides cached synchronous translation for repeated short phrases, useful for statuses and headers; utilizes translate_sync and supports context-based translation.

functions.name: translate_thinking
functions.description: Переводит внутренние рассуждения агента на русский язык с контекстом анализа кода и решения задач, используя асинхронную функцию.

functions.name: translate_validator_verdict
functions.description: Переводит вердикт AI Validator на русский язык с контекстом "code validator's assessment and verdict". Использует асинхронную функцию translate_to_russian.

functions.name: translate_code_explanation
functions.description: Переводит объяснение кода на русский язык с контекстом для генератора кода, используя асинхронный вызов функции translate_to_russian.

functions.name: translate_analysis
functions.description: Переводит текст анализа Оркестратора на русский язык с контекстом "code analysis and architectural assessment", используя асинхронную функцию.

functions.name: reset_translation_state
functions.description: Resets the translator's internal state, disabling translation lock and clearing the translation cache to allow retrying translations after errors.

functions.name: test_translation
functions.description: Тестирует работу API перевода, проверяя, возвращает ли перевод текста корректный русский результат. Использует логирование для отслеживания успешных и неуспешных тестов.

functions.name: check_translation_available
functions.description: Проверяет синхронно, доступен ли перевод на основе конфигурации, без вызова API; возвращает True, если переводчик должен работать. Использует настройки из конфигурации и модули logging, functools.lru_cache.

functions.name: get_validation_logger
functions.description: Provides a session-specific validation logger, reusing the existing logger if the session ID matches.

functions.name: log_validation_error
functions.description: Logs validation errors with stage, exception, and optional context; uses a current logger if available or falls back to standard logging.

functions.name: patched_run
functions.description: Логирует вызовы subprocess.run, проверяет параметры encoding и text, и автоматически исправляет проблемы с кодировкой в текстовом режиме. Интегрируется с logging и модифицирует поведение subprocess.run через обёртку.

functions.name: test_validation_with_bad_import
functions.description: Тестирует валидатор на обработку ошибок импорта, проверяя, что он не падает и корректно обнаруживает отсутствующий модуль. Использует VirtualFileSystem и конфигурацию валидатора для симуляции реального проекта.

functions.name: test_validation_with_cyrillic
functions.description: Tests validation pipeline with Cyrillic characters in code and comments, ensuring UTF-8 handling works with syntax, imports, and type checks.

functions.name: test_mypy_direct
functions.description: Tests direct mypy execution on a Python file with Cyrillic content, ensuring subprocess correctly handles output and encoding. Uses temporary directories and subprocess calls to validate mypy's behavior.

functions.name: test_pip_list
functions.description: Runs pip list --format=json to retrieve installed Python packages in JSON format, validates the output, and checks for parsing errors. Used to test the functionality that may be causing issues in _get_pip_packages().

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs integration tests for a validation pipeline, checking for issues like bad imports, Cyrillic handling, mypy compliance, and subprocess encoding problems.

functions.name: _build_feedback_handling_block
functions.description: Generates a structured feedback handling protocol for code generation systems, outlining principles, analysis steps, feedback types, and required response formats to improve instruction accuracy.

functions.name: get_feedback_loader
functions.description: Provides a singleton instance of FeedbackPromptLoader for managing feedback prompts globally.

functions.name: reset_feedback_loader
functions.description: Resets the global feedback loader instance to prepare for a new session. Used to clear previous state before initializing a new feedback process.

functions.name: get_feedback_block_if_needed
functions.description: Returns a feedback block string if errors are present, otherwise returns an empty string; used for prompt formatting. Integrates with a feedback loader to retrieve or trigger feedback content.

functions.name: parse_args
functions.description: Parses command-line arguments for testing indentation handling in FileModifier, supporting verbose mode, test filtering, and temp file cleanup control.

functions.name: should_skip
functions.description: Determines if a test should be skipped based on a filter argument, returning "filtered out" if the filter does not match the test name.

functions.name: validate_python_syntax
functions.description: Checks if a Python code string has valid syntax, returning a boolean and error message if invalid.

functions.name: get_indentation
functions.description: Calculates the indentation level of a given string line in spaces. Used for analyzing or modifying code formatting.

functions.name: test_normalize_basic
functions.description: Tests the normalization of code indentation from 8 spaces to 4 spaces using the FileModifier class. Verifies correct indentation levels and code structure after transformation.

functions.name: test_normalize_zero_indent
functions.description: Tests normalization of code indentation to zero indent (module level), using the FileModifier service to adjust indentation and validate results.

functions.name: test_normalize_preserve_relative
functions.description: Tests that code indentation is normalized while preserving relative indentation levels, using a sample nested code block and asserting expected indentation per line.

functions.name: test_normalize_empty_lines
functions.description: Tests that empty lines in code are preserved without trailing spaces during indentation normalization, using the FileModifier service.

functions.name: test_normalize_mixed_indents
functions.description: Tests the normalization of Python code with mixed indentation levels, ensuring correct indentation and valid syntax when embedded in a class structure.

functions.name: test_detect_indent_before
functions.description: Tests the detection of indentation from preceding lines in a file, using the FileModifier class to determine the correct indent level at a specific line.

functions.name: test_detect_indent_after
functions.description: Tests the detection of indentation (4 spaces) by analyzing lines after a given index in a file, using the FileModifier service.

functions.name: test_replace_method_with_wrong_indent
functions.description: Tests the REPLACE_METHOD functionality with incorrectly indented code (8 spaces), ensuring it is auto-corrected to proper Python indentation (4 spaces for method, 8 for body). Integrates with FileModifier and syntax validation.

functions.name: test_replace_method_with_zero_indent
functions.description: Tests replacing a method in a Python file with code that has zero indentation, ensuring the FileModifier correctly applies and indents the replacement code. Uses a test fixture and validates the resulting Python syntax.

functions.name: test_replace_method_preserves_others
functions.description: Tests that the REPLACE_METHOD operation in FileModifier preserves other methods and classes in a file, using a sample service file as input.

functions.name: test_replace_function_wrong_indent
functions.description: Tests the correction of function indentation when replacing a function in a Python file, ensuring the new function is at the module level with 0 indentation. Integrates with FileModifier, ParsedCodeBlock, and syntax validation.

functions.name: test_insert_class_new_method
functions.description: Tests inserting a new method into a class with correct indentation and positioning, using a file modifier and validation.

functions.name: test_insert_class_no_existing_methods
functions.description: Tests inserting a method into a Python class that initially has no methods, using the FileModifier service.

functions.name: test_patch_method_insert_after
functions.description: Tests inserting code after a specific line in a method using the PATCH_METHOD pattern, ensuring correct placement and syntax validity. Integrates with FileModifier and TestFixture.

functions.name: test_patch_method_insert_before_return
functions.description: Tests inserting code before a return statement in a method using PATCH_METHOD, validates syntax and insertion position.

functions.name: test_patch_method_default_before_return
functions.description: Tests the default behavior of the PATCH_METHOD in FileModifier, ensuring code is inserted before the return statement in the target method.

functions.name: test_replace_class_wrong_indent
functions.description: Tests replacing a class with incorrect indentation in a file, ensuring the replacement is corrected and does not affect other classes. Uses FileModifier and Python syntax validation.

functions.name: test_insert_into_file_function
functions.description: Tests the INSERT_INTO_FILE functionality for adding a new function with correct indentation and syntax validation. Uses a test fixture and integrates with FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock.

functions.name: test_async_method_replace
functions.description: Tests replacing an async method in a Python class using a file modifier, ensuring syntax validity and correct content preservation. Integrates with FileModifier, ParsedCodeBlock, and test utilities.

functions.name: test_method_with_decorator_replace
functions.description: Tests replacing a method with decorators in a Python class, ensuring the replacement preserves the decorator and maintains valid syntax. Uses a file modifier and validation for async code.

functions.name: test_nested_class_method
functions.description: Tests replacing a method inside a nested class using the FileModifier, ensuring correct syntax and content after modification.

functions.name: test_vfs_integration_modify
functions.description: Tests integration between FileModifier and VirtualFileSystem by applying a code block to a virtual file, verifying staged changes, and ensuring original files remain unmodified. Uses test fixtures and assertions for validation.

functions.name: test_multiple_blocks_same_file
functions.description: Tests applying multiple code modification blocks to the same file, including replacing a method and inserting a new one, using a virtual file system. Integrates with FileModifier, ParsedCodeBlock, and VirtualFileSystem.

functions.name: test_extreme_indent_correction
functions.description: Tests the correction of extreme indentation (16+ spaces) in Python code, ensuring it is properly converted to standard 4-space indentation. Integrates with FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock for code transformation and validation.

functions.name: test_tabs_to_spaces_conversion
functions.description: Tests whether tabs in code are converted to spaces during modification, but notes that the current implementation may not perform the conversion.

functions.name: test_generator_tabs_mixed_with_spaces
functions.description: Tests handling of mixed tabs and spaces in code indentation for a file modifier, ensuring valid Python output is generated. Integrates with FileModifier, ParsedCodeBlock, and syntax validation.

functions.name: test_generator_trailing_whitespace
functions.description: Tests handling of trailing whitespace in code generated by the FileModifier, using a sample code block and validating the output syntax.

functions.name: test_generator_windows_line_endings
functions.description: Tests handling of Windows CRLF line endings in code blocks processed by FileModifier, ensuring valid Python syntax is preserved. Integrates with TestFixture and ParsedCodeBlock for setup and validation.

functions.name: test_generator_inconsistent_indent_within_block
functions.description: Tests that a code block with inconsistent indentation is properly normalized by the FileModifier, ensuring valid Python syntax and correct indentation in the output.

functions.name: test_patch_deeply_nested_code
functions.description: Tests the ability to patch code at 4+ levels of nesting in a file using the FileModifier, validating syntax and insertion correctness. Integrates with TestFixture, ParsedCodeBlock, and validation utilities.

functions.name: test_insert_method_into_nested_class
functions.description: Tests inserting a method into a nested class using FileModifier, validating syntax and insertion order. Integrates with ParsedCodeBlock and TestFixture.

functions.name: test_replace_decorated_method_removes_old_decorators
functions.description: Tests that a decorated method is replaced correctly by removing old decorators while preserving others in the same file. Uses a file modifier to apply changes and validates the resulting code syntax and content.

functions.name: test_replace_method_with_new_decorators
functions.description: Tests replacing a plain method with a decorated version in a Python class, ensuring syntax validity and correct content replacement. Uses FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock for code transformation.

functions.name: test_replace_method_correct_class_first
functions.description: Tests replacing a method in the first class with duplicate method names across multiple classes, ensuring only the intended class is modified. Integrates with FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock for code transformation and validation.

functions.name: test_replace_method_correct_class_middle
functions.description: Tests replacing a method in a middle class when multiple classes have the same method name, ensuring only the target class is modified. Uses FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock to apply and validate the change.

functions.name: test_error_class_not_found
functions.description: Tests error handling when a target class does not exist in file modification, ensuring graceful failure and unchanged content. Integrates with FileModifier and TestFixture.

functions.name: test_error_method_not_found
functions.description: Tests error handling when a target method does not exist in a file modification operation, using a code block and FileModifier. Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_error_function_not_found
functions.description: Tests error handling when a target function does not exist in the file modification process, using the FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock.

functions.name: test_error_patch_pattern_not_found
functions.description: Tests error handling when a PATCH_METHOD pattern is not found in file modification, using a test fixture and asserting failure conditions.

functions.name: test_error_invalid_mode
functions.description: Tests that an error is properly raised when an invalid mode is used in FileModifier, ensuring failure handling for unrecognized code block modes. Integrates with TestFixture for setup and cleanup.

functions.name: test_error_syntax_error_in_existing_file
functions.description: Tests error handling when a syntax error exists in an existing file during code modification, using a test fixture and asserting the failure message contains syntax-related terms.

functions.name: test_replace_method_preserves_surrounding_comments
functions.description: Tests that the FileModifier preserves surrounding comments when replacing a method in a Python file, ensuring class-level, init, and inter-method comments remain intact.

functions.name: test_replace_preserves_class_attributes
functions.description: Tests that replacing a method in a class preserves existing class attributes and other methods. Uses a file modifier to apply changes and validates the output content.

functions.name: test_replace_method_with_only_pass
functions.description: Tests replacing a method with only pass in a Python class using the FileModifier, ensuring the replacement is syntactically valid and preserves other methods. Integrates with TestFixture, ParsedCodeBlock, and Python syntax validation.

functions.name: test_method_with_multiline_string
functions.description: Tests that multiline strings with irregular indentation in a Python file are correctly handled when replacing a method, ensuring the resulting code remains syntactically valid. Uses FileModifier and ParsedCodeBlock for code transformation.

functions.name: test_insert_import_deduplication
functions.description: Tests that the INSERT_IMPORT operation in FileModifier prevents duplicate imports, ensuring existing ones are not duplicated and warnings are generated appropriately. Integrates with ParsedCodeBlock and TestFixture for setup and validation.

functions.name: test_append_to_empty_file
functions.description: Tests appending a code block to an empty file using the FileModifier, ensuring the result is valid Python and contains the expected code.

functions.name: test_create_new_file_with_replace_file
functions.description: Tests the REPLACE_FILE mode of the FileModifier by creating a new file with specified Python content and validating its syntax and structure.

functions.name: run_all_tests
functions.description: Runs a comprehensive test suite for code indentation and modification operations, including unit, integration, edge case, stress, and special case tests.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Runs a comprehensive test suite for the runtime tester, executing all tests asynchronously and returning the success status. Includes warnings about test duration and behavior, and integrates with the ComprehensiveRuntimeTest class.

functions.name: get_line_indent
functions.description: Counts the number of leading spaces in a string, returns -1 if the string is empty.

functions.name: analyze_indents
functions.description: Анализирует отступы в строках кода и возвращает список с номером строки, размером отступа и содержимым строки без пробелов.

functions.name: find_line_starting_with
functions.description: Searches for a line in the given code that starts with the specified prefix after stripping whitespace, returning the line number, indentation level, and full line; returns (0, 0, "") if not found.

functions.name: run_tests
functions.description: Запускает набор модульных тестов для проверки функциональности, выводит детализированные результаты и возвращает статус успешного прохождения всех тестов. Использует unittest для организации и выполнения тестов.

functions.name: run_tests
functions.description: Запускает набор модульных тестов для проверки функциональности обработки кода, включая вставку, замену и модификацию методов и функций, с выводом детализированного отчёта о результатах. Использует unittest для организации и выполнения тестов.

functions.name: log_section
functions.description: Logs a section separator with a title using both a logger and a console, for visual organization in test output.

functions.name: get_test_cases
functions.description: Defines a set of test cases for code generation and modification scenarios, covering both "ASK" and "AGENT" modes, including method modifications, new method additions, file creation, multi-file imports, complex entity modifications, and refactoring with module extraction.

functions.name: run_ask_mode_test
functions.description: Asynchronous test runner for code generation models, integrates with generate_code() to evaluate model performance and validate output against expected elements.

functions.name: run_agent_mode_test
functions.description: Runs AGENT mode tests for code generation models, using generate_code_agent_mode() to evaluate output quality, correctness, and performance, with logging, diagnostics, and console feedback. Integrates with TestCase and TestResult for structured test execution and reporting.

functions.name: run_all_tests
functions.description: Runs comprehensive tests on multiple code generation models, comparing their performance in generate_code() and generate_code_agent_mode() across test cases, and outputs detailed results, summaries, and a recommended best-performing model. Integrates with logging, asyncio, and JSON for structured output.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Orchestrates and runs all tests for generator models, with error handling and console feedback using rich formatting.

functions.name: _get_parser
functions.description: Lazily initializes a Tree-sitter parser for Python, with logging and error handling for missing dependencies.

functions.name: get_parser
functions.description: Returns a global instance of the FaultTolerantParser, initializing it if it doesn't already exist.

functions.name: parse
functions.description: Parses source code using a global Tree Sitter parser, returns a ParseResult. Relies on get_parser() to initialize or retrieve the parser instance.

functions.name: find_class
functions.description: Searches for a class by name in the provided source code using a Tree-sitter parser. Returns a ParsedClass object if found, or None otherwise.

functions.name: find_method
functions.description: Searches for a method within a class in the provided source code using a Tree Sitter parser. Returns a ParsedFunction object if found, or None otherwise.

functions.name: find_function
functions.description: Searches for a function by name in the provided source code using a Tree Sitter parser. Returns a ParsedFunction object if found, or None otherwise.

functions.name: grep_search_tool
functions.description: Performs a grep-like search across files in a project directory and a virtual file system, supporting regex, case sensitivity, file filtering, and result limits, returning formatted XML output. Integrates with pathlib, re, and a custom VirtualFileSystem.

functions.name: _collect_disk_files
functions.description: Collects files from disk under a given root, applying file patterns, type detection, and exclusion rules, with a limit on the number of files returned. Integrates with FileTypeDetector and respects symlink structures.

functions.name: _should_process_file
functions.description: Determines if a file should be processed by checking if it is a regular text file, not a symlink, not excluded via VFS, and located within the project directory. Integrates with FileTypeDetector for file type classification.

functions.name: _search_in_content
functions.description: Searches for a compiled regex pattern in file content and returns matches with surrounding context, limited by the specified number of matches per file.

functions.name: _format_results
functions.description: Formats grep search results into an XML string with file and line context details, including summary comments for clarity.

functions.name: _escape_xml
functions.description: Escapes XML special characters in a string to ensure safe XML output. Replaces &, <, >, ", and ' with their corresponding XML entity equivalents.

functions.name: _format_error
functions.description: Formats error messages for grep search operations with a suggestion to check search patterns and file filters.

functions.name: show_file_relations_tool
functions.description: Analyzes and displays file relationships within a project, supporting virtual file systems and customizable inclusion of tests and sibling files, returning results in XML format.

functions.name: _analyze_file_relations
functions.description: Analyzes a file's relationships including imports, importers, test files, and sibling files within a project, with support for virtual file systems and customizable inclusion options.

functions.name: _read_file_content
functions.description: Reads file content from either a virtual file system or the actual file system, depending on availability. Uses pathlib for path resolution and handles UTF-8 encoding.

functions.name: _extract_imports
functions.description: Extracts import statements from file content using regular expressions, supporting both import X and from X import Y syntax.

functions.name: _find_importers
functions.description: Finds all Python files in a project that import the specified file, using a virtual file system for file access and analysis. Integrates with helper functions for module name conversion and import detection.

functions.name: _find_test_files
functions.description: Finds test files associated with a given Python file using a virtual file system or predefined naming patterns.

functions.name: _find_sibling_files
functions.description: Находит до 50 файлов-сibling'ов (файлов в той же директории) заданного файла, используя либо виртуальную файловую систему, либо прямой доступ к файловой системе.

functions.name: _path_to_module
functions.description: Converts a file path to a Python module name by removing .py and replacing slashes with dots, while handling __init__.py files appropriately.

functions.name: _file_imports_module
functions.description: Checks if a file imports a specified module using regex, supporting both direct and sub-module imports.

functions.name: _format_relations
functions.description: Formats file relationships data into an XML string with summary comments, structured by imports, imported_by, tests, and siblings.

functions.name: _format_error
functions.description: Форматирует сообщение об ошибке в XML-подобном формате с подсказкой по устранению проблемы.
